name: Nothing Together: Light Theme
description: Just doing Nothing is boring! Use the White Theme DLC to destroy your vision and see absolutely Nothing! It has never been easier to experience absolute nothingness!

name: Nothing Together: Cute Theme
description: With the Cute Theme DLC, you can look at cute colors while doing absolutely Nothing! Why would you want that? I don't know. Why would you want anything anyway, if you could have Nothing instead?

name: Nothing Together: Dark Theme
description: Experience truly Nothing with the Dark Theme DLC. Stare into the void and question your life decisions.

name: Donkey Kong Pac-Man Crossover
description: In this romhack Donkey Kong kidnaps Pauline again but gets help from the four Pac-Man ghosts Blinky, Pinky, Inky and Clyde. Jumpman and Pac-Man must join forces to save Pauline. Each board contains a number of pellets that must all be picked up before the board can be finished. You start each board playing as Jumpman, but you can temporarily transform to Pac-Man by picking up a power pellet. When you play as Pac-Man you are invincible and can chase and catch the ghosts. Make the Jumpman/Pac-Man team a success and save Pauline, but ... don't forget to pick up all pellets !!!

name: Rockman 2: StalkerMaestro vs The Rockmen
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: Dungeoning
description:
Dungeoning is a fantasy incremental RPG tribute to all things adventuronious.
It combines incremental mechanics with a layer of deep secrets and discovery, so the game plays in your pocket but occupies your mind.
It's a nonstop mobile dungeon crawler that navigates like Snapchat but looks like pixel-art RPGs of olde.

name: Fruit Ninja
description: Unofficial port of Fruit Ninja for the PSP.

name: MeteoRain
description: Sin descripción

name: Castlevania: Order of Ecclesia - Zero Collection
description: Sin descripción

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III - Season Pass
description: The Season Pass for Call of Duty: Black Ops III gets players access to four epic DLC packs. Each DLC pack contains four all-new multiplayer maps and one episode of the Zombies storyline.

name: The 2nd Super Super Mario Land
description: Sin descripción

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III - Zombies Chronicles Deluxe Edition
description:
Call of Duty: Black Ops III Zombies Chronicles Deluxe includes the full base game, Season Pass, Zombies Chronicles & additional bonus digital content including:

The Giant Bonus Map: Zombies returns in all of its undead glory with "The Giant". Re-live the chaos of Treyarch's classic "Der Riese" Zombies map, picking up the Zombies story with Dempsey, Nikolai, Richtofen, and Takeo where Origins left off.

3 Personalization Packs: Fan favorite Cyborg & Weaponized 115 packs along with a new Black Ops 3 pack. Each pack comes with a weapon camo, reticles, and calling card.

The Zombies Chronicles content expansion which delivers 8 remastered classic maps from Call of Duty: World at War, Call of Duty: Black Ops and Call of Duty: Black Ops II.

name: Super Super Mario Land
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Mario Bros.: The Lost Levels - All Levels in a Row
description: Sin descripción

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III - The Giant
description: Zombies returns in all of its undead glory with 'The Giant,' a research facility featuring the weapon-upgrading Pack-a-Punch Machine. Re-live the chaos of Treyarch's classic 'Der Riese' Zombies map, picking up the Zombies story with Dempsey, Nikolai, Richtofen, and Takeo where Origins left off.

name: Escape from the Facility
description: A romhack for Zelda: Ocarina of Time by CDi-Fails as a submission for the "Escape Room" competition of the Hylian Modding Discord.

name: Dino Park
description: Dino Park is a cozy idle game about collecting dinosaurs! Watch your dinosaurs level up in real time, earning more money for your park. Create the perfect environment for your dinosaurs to increase the chance of discovering super rare variants! Can you collect them all?

name: Call of Duty: Black Ops III Game of the Year + Zombie Chronicles Bundle
description: Call of Duty: Black Ops III - Game of the Year + Zombie Chronicles Bundle released only in Japan.

name: Midnight Custody
description: Midnight Custody is a short found-footage-style game where you wander through an eerie parking garage. It's a freaky, immersive terror fest that'll keep you on the edge of your seat!

name: Sippy Disco: Light Up The Dance Floor
description: Light up the dance floor in this cozy puzzle game! Sippy the unicorn must step on every square in the fewest possible moves to make the dance floor light up. Partner with Parrots on skates and disco balls to brighten everyone’s day!

name: Cordy Sky
description:
Cordy Sky is an endless jumping platform video game developed and published by SilverTreeMedia for Android and iOS on March 28th, 2012. The game takes place between the events of the first game and Cordy 2.

The gameplay is similar to Doodle Jump's gameplay, but also has some distinct elements. Every 1000 meters, you collect a Fuel Cell. Once you reach 5000 meters and have gotten all 5 Fuel Cells, the ship is refueled and Volt goes home. You can also collect Tap Tokens, which can be used to get prizes, such as gears or power-ups. The player can also purchase skins that all require a certain amount of gears to be purchased.

name: Dottie Flowers
description: Dottie Flowers is a Super Nintendo Entertainment System (SNES) game created by the indie developer Goldlocke. This charming platformer was released as a physical cartridge for the SNES/Super Famicom, and the digital version released on the 1st March 2024.

name: Jigsaw Explorer
description: Welcome! Jigsaw Explorer was created with the intent of providing jigsaw puzzle enthusiasts with a great selection of high quality, family friendly online jigsaw puzzles. We have thousands of hand picked puzzles available and new puzzles being added every day.

name: Kill Will
description: Sin descripción

name: Rox 64
description: The Rox conversion for the Commodore 64 further iterates from the original game for the VIC-20. In this title Jeff Minter pays tribute to the classic arcade game Missile Command.

name: Pac-Man Arcade Emulator
description: Despite the name, it's not an emulated version of the arcade game. Rather, it's a homebrew conversion of Pac-Man for the Amstrad CPC, in a way that tries to be the as arcade-perfect as it could with the CPC's hardware limits.

name: Andes Attack
description: Andes Attack is a Defender clone by Jeff Minter. In a true Minter fashion, instead of the original’s humans, you are out to rescue llamas which are under attack by the aliens. The player patrols the two-way scrolling landscape waiting for marauding aliens trying to abduct the llamas. You have to destroy the aliens before they manage to whisk away your precious camelid, if they manage to get them to the top of the screen they mutate into horrors that will come after you, resulting in a fatal collision. Each surviving llama gives you a bonus at the end of each stage.

name: Mazes of Karradash
description:
Mazes of Karradash is a first person dungeon crawl RPG. In this game you have to develop both the individual characters then the entire village.

The game's character creation has 8 races and 8 classes to unlocked with their own special skills and attributes. The dungeon has 25 levels to explore with new equipment unlocked by finding relics. It is a permadeath game but village upgrade options are available using the gold found before creating the next character for a new run.

No pay-to-win, no in-app-purchase of gold, diamonds, better equipment or other stuff: complete the game with your own skills. Old school.

name: Speed Plumber
description: Sin descripción

name: Bump 'n' Jump
description: The NES port of Bump 'n' Jump, an overhead-view vehicular combat game developed by Data East and originally released in Japan as "Burnin' Rubber". The arcade version was available as both a dedicated board and as part of Data East's DECO Cassette System. It was distributed in North America by Bally Midway. The goal is to drive to the end of a level while bumping enemy vehicles into the sides of the track and jumping over large obstacles such as bodies of water.

name: Cobra Command
description: The NES port of Cobra Command, a horizontal helicopter shoot 'em up for Arcade, where the player is tasked with both eliminating enemy forces as well as rescuing hostages.

name: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
description: The NES version of Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom.

name: Mario Kart 64 Remade
description:
Mario Kart 64 Remade is a custom track distribution created by Diego Vapy for Mario Kart Wii that recreates the Mario Kart 64 experience. It features all 16 tracks from Mario Kart 64 as well as remade music, item icons, models and HUD sprites based on Mario Kart 64.

Also included are 4 bonus cups that feature tracks from Super Mario Kart, Diddy Kong's Racing, Mickey's Speedway USA and original tracks based on Super Mario 64. It can be played online via Wiimmfi.

name: Platoon
description:
The NES port of Platoon. The film Platoon featured a squad of five soldiers on their mission for the US Army in Vietnam. In this action game based around the film, you take control of these five guys in turn, with the chance to switch between them as they each take one of the 3 hits that would kill them.

The game recreates each of the sections of the film, starting with a side-scrolling journey through the jungle, with paths to cross both horizontally and vertically, and the ability to jump or duck hazards. You will need to blow up a bridge and then locate a village, which contains a torch, a map and a trap-door. The enemy has booby-trapped the area and are launching airstrikes, so the danger is not all from enemy ground soldiers.

name: Xenophobe
description: The NES port of Xenophobe, a 1987 arcade game. The goal of each level is to defeat all the aliens before time runs out. Levels may contain more than one floor, and players use elevators or holes to move between floors to defeat all of the aliens. Players can also pick up more powerful weapons and other items to help in their eradication of the aliens.

name: Fallout: Yesterday
description: Fallout: Yesterday is a fan-made recreation of the canceled Black Isle's Fallout 3 (Van Buren) on the engine of Fallout 2.

name: Star Wars Galaxies: Evolve
description: A non-profit, fan-made, community-driven remaster of the classic MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies: An Empire Divided.

name: Cooking Mama Seasons
description: Cooking Mama Seasons is a kitchen simulation video game developed by Cooking Mama Limited that was released by Taito for iOS through Apple's iTunes Store. It is the direct successor of the original Cooking Mama mobile app for iPhone OS. It has since been removed from Apple's App Store, and a new 64-bit port for iOS was released in May 2015 as "Cooking Mama: Let's Cook!".

name: Leaping Legend
description:
Have fun storming the castle in the endless climber Leaping Legend!

Leaping Legend is a fast-paced arcade styled endless climber where your goal is to reach for glory by climbing, leaping, and surviving for as long as possible! Dodge obstacles like a champion or die trying. The choice is yours! Encounter not-so-unfamiliar heroes and enemies, avoid taking arrows to the knee, and prove that YOLO is a myth!

name: Art Inc.
description:
Ever dreamed about building your own gallery? Maintaining and curating it, picking out which exhibits to show to the public?

You can do exactly that (and more!) with Art Inc - let your wildest art gallery dreams come true! Climb to the top of the world and show off your unique exhibits and world-famous artifacts for everyone to ooh and aah at.

Start as a no-name gallery and level up to become the most epic, first-class, famous place to be. Bid at celebrated auctions to buy famous artifacts: from Ancient Egyptian Mummies, Science Fiction Alien UFOs to Prehistoric Dinosaur Fossils - collect them all!

name: EzQuiz
description:
Dive into EzQuiz, where hundreds of questions across diverse topics await to challenge your knowledge and sharpen your wits. How much do you really know?

EzQuiz has it all! Test your mastery across a universe of subjects in the most dynamic quiz game ever. Are you ready to become the ultimate quiz champion?

name: Spin the Lighthouse
description: Spin the Lighthouse offers a serene and meditative escape, inviting players to embark on a journey of relaxation. With a focus on simplicity and peaceful interactions, this game is designed for individuals of all ages who seek a moment of tranquility after a hectic day. Spin and unwind – "Spin the Lighthouse" is your ticket to a peaceful and rejuvenating gaming experience. Find your calm, one rotation at a time.

name: Tap Tap Evil Mastermind
description:
After becoming a filthy rich tap tap trillionaire, life got boring. What else is there to do? Build an evil empire and go on a quest for world domination – duh!

In this dangerously fun, evil idle clicker game, you work for the secret organization – The League of Evil. Starting with a small dungeon and just a few henchmen, you must use those infamous fingers to tap your way to power and riches!

Hire & train your minions, fight rival villains, trade on the black market and upgrade your base to become the sweetest evil HQ the world has ever seen!

name: Idle Museum Tycoon: Art Empire
description:
The goal of this fun tycoon game is to construct, repair, and manage an entire Museum. Art, Culture, and History is your business! You need to administer exhibitions of all kinds to attract visitors to see and contemplate the most incredible art and history collections of all time!

Manage and optimize resources like a business management simulator game and build now your art empire! Start with a small gallery, get visitors into the Museum, sell tickets to earn money, invest your earnings to buy new sets of cool art collections, and build more themed galleries!

name: Passage
description: A little game about childhood, secrets, and memories. Based on a true-ish story.

name: Santorini Board Game
description: Based off the physical board game of the same name, Santorini is a highly accessible pure strategy game where you build your way to victory!

name: Spark & Kling
description: Spark & Kling is a couch co-op puzzle platformer where the player will take the role of either Spark, the electric bug, or Kling the metal gel blob. They are trapped in a Homemade lab by a Mad Scientist and the players will have to overcome obstacles and work together to escape.

name: Sekiro: Long May the Shadows Reflect
description: A huge overhauled mod that makes the game more challenging. Skills, items, Bosses, enemies, upgrades, etc, almost everything changes in this mod. Long may the shadows reflect!

name: Oblivion Eve
description:
A roguelike action-platformer where you use upgradeable weapons to combo powerful enemies to their doom!

Overcome tough fights, platforming challenges, puzzles, and more in your effort to free the titan who is incarcerated in the shifting prison's depths.

name: Little Eidolons
description:
An open-world rpg for Pico-8, where you can catch, train, and battle with over 100 varieties of monsters!

Gameplay is performed by navigating the overworld until you encounter either a wild Eidolon or an opposing trainer, which transitions the game to battle mode. Battle mode uses turn-based mechanics across a grid to allow you to fight - until all foes are defeated!

name: Picowings
description:
Take off and explore the mountains and lakes of Picotopia! A flight simulator made for PICO-8.

Flight model should be "somewhat realistic" in that it models thrust, lift, drag and weight--Of course all the numbers are made up, and things are grossly simplified.

name: Sphero
description: Rescue Blocklandia from the evil clutches of Duke Cube. Find the nine golden keys to unlock the gate to the magic portal and recover the crown.

name: Submerged Gallery
description: Explore a virtual gallery of submechanophobia in a retro computing environment.

name: Dungeon!
description: Based on the board game of the same name by TSR Hobbies.

name: Fortnite: Chapter 5 - Season 2: Myths & Mortals
description: Pandora’s Box has been opened on the Fortnite Battle Royale Island, bringing Olympus to the battlefield. Olympian legends — including Hades and the thunder god Zeus — now rule the Island in otherworldly rage. To make matters worse, they’ve brought their powers and weapons with them. Use their mythological means against them in Chapter 5 Season 2: Myths & Mortals!

name: OEC ConnecTrade
description:
Select four products and tap 'Submit' to check if your guess corresponds to the top 4 exports of that country.
Find the groups without making 6 mistakes!

name: The Presidential Turnabout
description: You play as Apollo, with Trucy as your ever-loyal sidekick. As with most people, the JFK case has always lurked at the back of your mind since childhood, but you’ve never taken a real interest in resolving it until now. But when an innocent trip to a space museum takes a dangerous turn and spirals into a nightmarish adventure of time travel and lawbreaking, you are forced to journey back to the fateful day of John Kennedy’s murder, and find yourself defending the most notorious assassin (or fall guy!) in history, Lee Harvey Oswald. As you hunt around the now world-famous crime scene, desperately looking for some clue or scrap of evidence that everyone else might have overlooked, you slowly become more and more unnerved at the steady trickle of evidence that…….just doesn’t make sense. Your client is clearly not telling you everything he knows, but is he the only one with a skeleton in his closet? Just how many of your own preconceived notions on this case will you have to take another look at? Will you be able to uncover the truth in time, and save your client from his historical date with destiny? Or will you be forced to watch powerlessly, as the inevitable sequence of known events unfolds before your eyes?

name: School Of Love: Clubs!
description: School Of Love: Clubs! is a high quality Dating Sim/Visual Novel game. There are so many things you can do in the game and many more such as easter eggs, secret objects, cards etc. This will be an amazing journey.

name: The Pharaoh's Tomb
description: Pharaoh's Tomb is isomatiric view adventure game same as 'gold yard' by francesco maisto released in 2004.

name: Altarium
description: Altarium is a first-person, asymmetric PVP Co-Op horror game that can be played by 1-5 players together. Players can choose to play as either the victim or the evil character. Get ready, choose your role, shape your destiny, and survive!

name: Dungeon
description:
Koei’s Dungeon asks you to pick a class — Warrior, Thief, Cleric, Wizard or Ninja — and explore a large island in search of El Dorado.

While the towns are text-only, the rest of the game is an impressive programming featfor it's time, the overworld has a handy mini-map and the island’s underground is a dungeon with multiple entry points that’s over 250 x 250 squares.

You will face monsters based on the D&D rulebooks: Mind Flayers, Frost Giants, Flesh Golems and even the demon prince Demogorgon.

name: Danchi-zuma no Yuuwaku
description: Koei’s erotic RPG about a condom salesman visiting an apartment block, where he must knock on doors trying to “sell his products”, while battling Yakuza and ghosts who roam the halls.

name: Ghost Master: Complete Edition
description: Ghost Master: Complete Edition aims to add back all the cut content from the game, including ghosts and levels.

name: Chitei Tanken
description:
Underground Exploration is a non-graphical game where players form a party of 4-5 adventurers, fight monsters, collect treasures, and purchase weapons. The game uses text-based commands and a time-passage system.

Arguably the first RPG to be produced in Japan.

name: P-O-X
description:
Create custom POX Infectors by combining heads, bodies and tails, program combat sequences and personalize them with their own names.

Explore 17 levels of mazes, find out what your Infector can do and capture over 60 body parts.

Battle wirelessly against other players.

name: Timmy and the Magic Pictures
description:
Following Timmy's Sea Adventure, this is the second release in the Timmy's series of interactive stories, written by David Grossman.

Timmy finds that he can make the pictures on his bedroom wall come to life. This leads to many games and activities that improve reading and thinking skills : labyrinth, matching games, jigsaw puzzles and even play music with Timmy's xylophone.

In the options, you can set the levels of play (3), change the language and turn on/off the background music.

name: Longcat Journey
description: Longcat Journey is a Snake-like puzzle game. Stretch the cat to collect all the fish scattered around the screen and reach the ladder to complete each level.

name: MoHun Online
description: Mohun Online, hundreds of thousands of knights are out, and blind box will be released in March! Continue to write the legend of Mo Xiang, perfect transformation! A classic online game that Chinese people all over the world are recalling. A martial arts RPG featuring a high degree of freedom and no career restrictions.

name: Beyblade Burst
description: Beyblade Burst (Japanese: ベイブレードバースト, Beiburēdo Bāsuto) is a Beyblade handheld video game for the Nintendo 3DS published by FuRyu. It was released on November 10, 2016 in Japan.

name: Retrobloc CPC
description: Retrobloc CPC is a 3d puzzle game, similar to the late 80's Block Out, for the Amstrad CPC 464 / 664 / 6182. The game is simple to play but hard to master!

name: Video Art Activity Cartridge
description: Sin descripción

name: A Trip To The Zoo
description: Sin descripción

name: Disney Coloring Book
description: Sin descripción

name: Disney Story Book
description: Sin descripción

name: Pick the Star
description: "PICK THE STAR (10 liner)" is a multitasking arcade game for one player. The player must pick mostly the stars that descend from the top of the screen using the joystick.

name: Looney Tunes
description: Sin descripción

name: Marvel Super-Heroes
description: Sin descripción

name: My Dream Day
description: Sin descripción

name: Dokoban
description:
Dokoban is a sokoban game for the Amstrad CPC. The main character is the doctor or adminis the french gamopat forum.

Keyboard arrows are used to move the character and pushing the blocks.

ENTER/RETURN key is used to restart level.

The game includes 13 levels (size 20x12)

name: My Favorite Doll
description: Sin descripción

name: On the Move
description: Sin descripción

name: Acme, Inc.
description: The aim of the game is to make the coyote run for as long as possible, avoiding the barrels that roll towards him. The more barrels you avoid, the higher the score. It is a self-competiting game, and it is designed for one player.

name: Amphibian Assault
description:
Where did things go wrong? You just went out to run some errands, and now look what happened. Lost in a swamp somewhere in the middle of the night.

A quite harrowing predicament to be in for a mere firefly. Uneasily you try to find your way back home, but it's no good.

Now your mind is playing tricks on you, you could have sworn something moved in the bushes ahead. From all around you, you start hearing ominous noises. Hungry eyes are leering at you in the dark. Then it begins! Frogs are attacking you from every direction! Escape is definitively out of the question. Being a firefly, you are able to defend yourself, But for how long?

Use your joystick in port II to take out the approaching frogs with fireballs. At first only a couple of them dare to come near. But in no time you are overwhelmed by entire swarms. Try to survive as long as possible, and take out as many frogs as you can, before you get swallowed.

Press any key to play again.

name: La Escalera
description:
Conversion of the classic Board game for ZX Spectrum 48 Kb.

Dice game.

The objective of the game is to reach square 100.

3 different boards to choose from.

Up to 4 players configurable to be controlled by people or the computer.

name: Super Mario Bros. 3: Xmas Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Black Smith
description: ■Work every day and if you save enough money, you can go and meet your girl.■BlackSmith lower his hammer. Click at the exact moment that the hammer lands. The better your timing is, the more experience points you'll get.■The higher your experience points, the more expensive you can sell your products.

name: Adult World 3D
description: A web-based computer sex simulation game, featuring highly customizable interactive 3D scenes.

name: Bubble Frog
description: A bubbly adventure through colorful lands as a Frog in a Bubble trying to rescue 160 Onigiri for his best buddy OniGary. Can you avoid the spikes and traps and make it out with your Bubble still whole?!

name: Topolon
description: A futuristic action puzzle game that challenges the nano world! It is an action puzzle game that exterminates the virus that erodes the nano circuit "TOPOLON". If you defeat all the viruses on the screen, the stage will be cleared. The game can be enjoyed in 3 different game modes and 3 levels of difficulty, and the stage can be played unlimitedly with a random generation function.

name: Blobby's Adventure
description: It's your virtual pet Blobby's adventure! Guide him through the virtual world until he reaches the castle in the sky. Defeat the castle boss to win the game. Collect hearts to refill your health.

name: Cathode Ray Sunshine
description:
This is a short horror game that I developed for Fantasy Console Game Jam #3 using the Pico-8 fantasy console. This game is not suited for children or those who are easily disturbed.

The objective of this game is to move around a desolated town and touch certain magic pillars. When you touch the pillars (it's a little finicky, so try to move around them a bit), a streetlight will come on near a lighthouse to signify your progress. You must light all six streetlights, at which point the lighthouse will light up. Touch the light of the lighthouse to complete the game.

name: Laser Blast!
description: Help Atom Girl defeat waves of enemies trying to stop her as she races through space. Use her ability to change into a ship and back to blast her foes into stardust.

name: Laser Blast! 2: The Fight
description: This sci-fi themed platformer is the sequel to Laser Blast! Play as the advanced robot Atom Girl and progress through a platforming level, defeating enemy forces along the way. Destroy the end boss to complete Atom Girl's mission and buy her time to repair herself so that she can escape the planet Garlock-7, where a hostile force has taken over.

name: Laser Blast! 3: Fury of the Wizard
description: Laser Blast! 3: Fury of the Wizard is a 2d 8-bit rail shooter in the style of Space Harrier. Enemies will periodically fly towards you. Shoot them down while avoiding their attacks. When the sun sets, defeat the level boss to win the game.

name: Laser Blast! 4: The Lunasol Encounter
description: This sci-fi themed platformer is the fourth in the Laser Blast! series. Play as the advanced robot Atom Girl and progress through a platforming level, defeating enemy forces along the way. Destroy the end boss to complete Atom Girl's mission and help save her planet from evil invading forces.

name: Story of the Mirror
description:
A short horror game developed for DarkTober Game Jam 2018 using the Pico-8 fantasy console. This game is not suited for children or those who are easily disturbed.

The objective of this game is to find the old mirror, locate the dark path and get the orbs of light. This will require navigating 3 different worlds of increasing tension and horror.

name: Conscientious Objector
description:
Conscientious Objector is a Doom 3 mod that uses the first three levels of the commercial game, stripped bare and repopulated, together with some custom code that stops the player from being able to kill anything.

Sure, you can shoot the zombies all you like, and they will fall down.. it's just that they'll get back up again... On top of this, rather than being told you're great, like most FPS games, you've got an aggressive NPC on your case and in your ear, who'd like nothing better than to see you end up as a zombie's breakfast, and is going to let you know any chance he gets.

name: Antlion Soccer
description: A multiplayer mod for up to 8 players. Antlion Soccer is a pretty simple idea - two teams (Combine vs Citizens), one pitch, two goals, gravity guns all round and a huge pile of Antlions. Score goals by punting Antlions into the opposing team's goals. Being released with vmfs and source files as it's so much fun (and simple) to generate new maps.

name: Perdition's Flames
description: The afterlife isn't what you expected. Explore a strangely modernized and bureaucratic underworld, replete with strip malls, government offices, and science labs, as well as the occasional lake of molten rock.

name: Never Gives Up Her Dead
description:
Time is running out after a meteor strikes your interstellar starship. While the crew is under full alert, only you seem to notice the strange red portals opening up throughout the ship.

Explore ten different worlds, learn the truth of your destiny, and confront the mysterious figure who has been haunting you from the start in this epic sci-fi adventure.

name: Rude Chess
description:
Use arrow keys to walk, R to restart and Z to undo

Push blocks & chess pieces onto the grey Xs

Chess pieces will try to make your life harder, this'll be explained better in-game

Wow

name: Ark of Charon
description: A merge of colony sim and tower defense, build upon the back of a colossal beast and journey to deliver the World Tree sapling to its nursery. Gather resources, craft, and construct during stops and fight back against the monsters who attack during your journey.

name: It's a Block-Pushing Game
description: Push block? Push block! Block-pushing! Push! Block! Push! Block! Push! Push!

name: Battlefield
description:
Battlefield was an online multiplayer game where the player controlled a tank belonging to one of the four teams, moving around the map and firing at enemies. The game was partially turn-based: while the player gave their tanks commands in real-time, the tanks made their moves in turns. Tanks could also teleport to any spot on the map, lay down mines as traps for enemy tanks, and use a radar to detect hidden enemy mines and pickups.

Fuel played the role of the tank's health, and it was consumed by moving, teleporting, shooting, using a radar, laying mines, or getting shot by enemies. Upon running out of fuel the tank was deactivated and the player had to wait to respawn. It could be replenished by collecting fuel canisters. Equipment could also be acquired; this included better weapons, protective shields, and a long-range radar. Other map features included obstacles which could be moved around by the tank, and ferries used for transport over water.

The game was originally available on the game website Bonus.com, but became defunct when the website closed in 2004. It was later available at the URL playbattlefield.com until 2008.

name: Trust Me
description: Guide the twin cats to their childhood friend Mii-chan. A two-player cooperative game created in PICO-8.

name: Hovering Castle
description: Hovering castle is one of the first Bulgarian games for PC. The game is a representative of the Quest genre, it was created in 1992 and is not commercial. The authors are Hristo Bozhinov, Ivan Kolev and Stanislav Evstatiev. Ivan Kolev and Stanislav Evstatiev later founded Dimension Design and Garga Games. The game has graphics of (320x200x256 colors) with drawn characters and setting, and even becomes "cult" for many players. The game is partly controlled by text commands in Bulgarian, such as "Вземи чашата", and there are constantly witty messages in Bulgarian.

name: Banjo-Kazooie in Super Mario 64
description: A mod which adds Super Mario 64 levels into Banjo-Kazooie.

name: Diddy Kong Racing: Ocarina of Time
description: Sin descripción

name: Spectral Filter
description: Spectral Filter is a short horror game developed by Austin Schaeffer over the span of about 2 months with an original soundtrack by Cyrus Byrd.

name: Fire Emblem: Thracia 776 - Forseti's Cut
description: Forseti's Cut is a project that restores unused content (namely units, events and bosses), adds dozens of brand-new conversations, and rebalances the game on both the player and enemy side, on top of many enhanced portraits and slightly improved UI, all in an attempt to offer a fresh experience for FE5 veterans.

name: Radagon Boss FIght
description: A collab work of modders in sekiro modding community, to add the marvelous fight from Elden Ring to Sekiro.

name: X-Men: Character - Wolverine
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Men: Character - Lady Deathstrike
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Men: Attack MOD - Adamantium Claws
description: Sin descripción

name: The Night Wanderer
description:
"The Night Wanderer" is a hybrid of RPG and soulslike genres, characterized by unique solutions and an innovative approach to tried-and-true mechanics. The game utilizes level design known from Metroidvania games and a combat system native to soulsborne productions, which emphasizes dynamic yet tactical gameplay.

The game is based on the award-winning fantasy novel "Lord of the Ice Garden" by Jarosław Grzędowicz.

name: X-Men: Attack MOD - Big Chill
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Men: Character - Storm
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Men: Ultimate Character - Wolverine
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Men: Attack MOD - Cyborg Assault
description: Sin descripción

name: X-Men: Danger Room - Strength Room
description: Sin descripción

name: Nizhan Future
description: Nizhan Future is Tencent Games’ upcoming sci-fi shooter title. Under the development of TiMi Studios, the game will take you on a futuristic adventure with multiple game modes on offer.

name: Day: Dream
description: A linear visual novel about memories from long ago, taking place in the distant future.

name: Stellar Orphans
description: Indie roguelite deckbuilder in space

name: Point
description:
You have to find shapes hidden throughout the level. All of the arrows will point at the hidden shape! When you think you found it, Left Click to make a guess.

You have a certain number of incorrect guesses allowed in each level. You can see the number remaining in the top left corner. Try not to click too many times or you'll have to restart the level!

name: Exterminator
description: Sin descripción

name: Bios Fear
description: It's up to you to save what's left of humanity from its own greed and corporate profit motives. What little remains of Earth's ecosystem is protected within giant biodomes, and the dome systems are failing. Can you find a way to fix them before all life on Earth dies?"

name: ChessBase 1.0
description: Starting in 1983, Frederic Friedel and his colleagues put out a magazine Computer-schach und Spiele covering the emerging hobby of computer chess. In 1985, Friedel invited then world chess champion Garry Kasparov to his house. Kasparov mused about how a chess database would make it easier for him to prepare for specific opponents. Friedel began working with Bonn physicist Matthias Wüllenweber who created the first such database, ChessBase 1.0, as software for the Atari ST. The February 1987 issue of Computer-schach und Spiele introduced the database program as well as the ChessBase magazine, a floppy disk containing chess games edited by chess grandmaster John Nunn.

name: Clandestine: The Hidden Truth
description: "Clandestine: The Hidden Truth" is a first-person psychological horror game. Investigate a family homicide, manipulate reality with polaroids, and solve puzzles to unveil chilling secrets hidden within this enigmatic home of horrors. Will you come back unscathed?

name: FreeGen
description: FreeGen is a 3D tactical multiplayer first person shooter in space. It s not a space sim - it s a combined indoor/outdoor shooter. So don t look for physical realism - look for action and cunning! The gameplay demo is just a conceptual version of FreeGen which demonstrates the main idea of the game. The demo is LAN multiplayer only without Internet and singleplay (bots) which of course will be added later. In the final release most code (graphics and network engine AI etc.) and art will be changed or replaced. We just think that conceptual demo is better than conceptual art or movies and screenshots.

name: Ore no Sentai Oranger
description:
I'll make the next hero! Hero Squadron, training hobby!
It is a training hobby game to become the commander of the Hero Squadron, which is the face of Sunday, and nurture a new squadron. There are 5 members of the squadron, each of which has its own personality depending on their personality, age and gender. In addition to normal physical skills, the grown-up Orrangers will master "special moves" that make use of their specialty areas such as Ike-face attacks that shoot moms' hearts. The growth of the nurtured Oranger can be confirmed in the battle with the enemies in the Sunday morning program and sales (children's festival). The main fans are children, junior high school students, and housewives. There are various ways to enjoy it, such as cultivating a squadron by which fan base you want to be loved, and aiming for the first place by competing with other heroes in the national popularity ranking. Let's grow your favorite squadron!

name: Space Will
description: Sixty basic cores, hundreds of base station equipment, and thousands of chips, you can freely cooperate and shoot through the dual-angle joystick operation in a survival Roguelike game! Explore the sci-fi space and build your strongest battleship!

name: TimeSplitters Next
description:
TimeSplitters Next was a project in development by Free Radical Design before the studio was closed down by its parent company Embracer Group.

Developers who worked on the project said it started off as a Fortnite clone before morphing into an expanded alternate universe take on the classic TimeSplitters 2.

name: Fight Night Round 2
description: Exclusive to the GameCube version is Super Punch Out as a bonus game.

name: Honkai: Star Rail - Into the Yawning Chasm
description:
Version 2.1 of Honkai: Star Rail, which includes:
• New characters: Acheron, Aventurine and Gallagher
• New Trailblaze Mission: The Devil in Velvet
• New areas: Clock Studios Theme Park and Dwlight Pavilion
• New event: Vignettes in a Cup
• New quality of life updates
• …and more!

name: Ace Attorney Online
description: AAO is the first place to play, create and share adventure games, using gameplay elements from Capcom's Ace Attorney series.

name: Ultra Business Tycoon IV: Whitewater Rafting
description: The sequel to Ultra Business Tycoon III by indie developer and author Porpentine.

name: Fairest
description:
“Mirror, mirror, on the wall,” you say dreamily, gazing into its sparkling surface…

“You know,” replies the mirror, “I can do a lot more than just reflect fair faces. O, how I long to leap off this wall! I want to meet princesses, witches, and wolves … to win a throne and become a hero! What say you?”

Well, what say you, adventurer?

name: Miner Rogue
description: An open-world crafting roguelike voxel based where everything is destructible and randomly generated, daylight is for exploring, mining rare minerals, forging powerful weapons, and building your fortress. As the sun sets, monsters emerge to attack your base.

name: Prism
description:
Born to a city of wonders beyond your reach, scarcity has always been a close friend. As a courier, the city’s human infrastructure, you scale its roofworks, evade its constables, risk death every day for others’ convenience — until opportunity crosses your path, and you’re allowed to discover what you believe beyond survival.

Given a scrap of power, how do you reinvent yourself, your relationship to the city, its people? Will it allow you to maintain a companionship based on mutual struggle?

And, beneath it all, from where do the canals in this desert flow?

name: Dark Sky
description: Lead a party of unlikely heroes as they uncover the truth behind a planetary catastrophe in this immersive turn-based RPG. Craft and upgrade character cards into powerful combos while you battle your way through this beautifully hand-drawn alien world!

name: The Bones of Rosalinda
description:
”Hey, you! Skeleton lady! Can you hear me? You’ve got to pull yourself together and run before the Necromancer turns you into one of his minions!”

Rosalinda realised she wasn’t dreaming. She was in a dark cave, most of her body was missing and there was an agitated brown mouse yelling at her.

”O-okay,” she said. “How do I get out of this place? And... where are my legs?”

Her first day of un-life wasn’t going to be easy.

name: Lady Thalia and the Rose of Rocroi
description: Everyone who’s anyone summers in France - which means master thief Lady Thalia is there too, attending garden parties by day and stealing masterpieces by night. Unfortunately, this holiday is less than restful, as she crosses paths with foes both old and new. Case your targets, steal works of art, and team up with your Scotland Yard nemesis in this puzzle-based Twine game.

name: Lady Thalia and the Masterpiece of Moldavia
description:
Lady Thalia is back in London and back to her old tricks, putting up with Britain’s social elite by day so she can steal from them by night. But that doesn’t mean things are easy, what with her husband back from abroad and a new detective hot on her trail. Still, she’s not going to let those little things distract her from pulling off the heist of her career, even if she needs a bit of help to do it…

Explore London, match wits with friends and foes, and steal everything that’s not nailed down (and some things that are) in this gripping installment of the Lady Thalia series!

name: Crucial 2: The Refresh Update
description: Crucial 2 is a modpack for Minecraft that aims to enhance the gameplay experience while maintaining the feel of vanilla Minecraft.

name: The Little Match Girl 2: Annus Evertens
description: The little match girl is hired to assassinate a disgusting old man.

name: The Little Match Girl, by Hans Christian Andersen
description: In The Little Match Girl by Hans Christian Andersen, a little girl is forced to sell matches on the street in the cold of New Year's Eve.

name: Ninja no Gakko
description:
Train without haste! A collection of mini-games set in a ninja school.

Players become students of ninja schools and take various ninjutsu classes in a mini-game format to hone their skills.
Ninja school is a three-year system. " Improve your ninjutsu skills in classes such as "the art of change", "the art of hiding", and "shuriken throwing" and challenge the promotion exam and graduation exam.

Also, after graduating from ninja school, a complete "job history" is also prepared as a hit-and-run element.

The game starts from the first grade. As a class, it is a flow to improve your grades while practicing mini-games and challenge the promotion exam. There is no limit to the number of classes, and you can take your favorite subjects as many times as you want, so let's practice as much as you want, such as practicing the subjects you are not good at and updating the best score!

Demonstrate the results of your training in the exam!

The exam is to play mini-games in all classes in no particular order and in a row. If you meet a certain standard together with the results of the regular class, you will pass the exam. Please achieve excellent grades and aim for graduation.

Includes a mini-game that requires concentration!!

There are 5 types of mini-games. You can play a wide variety of mini-games, such as "Shuriken throwing" that aims at enemies that appear up, down, left, and right, and "the art of change" that memorizes the cry of frogs in order. If you advance, you will be able to take new classes, and the difficulty of the subjects so far will also increase!!

name: How the Little Match Girl Got Her Colt Paterson Revolver, and Taught a Virtue to a Goblin
description: The little match girl acquires a Colt Paterson revolver and teaches a virtue to a goblin.

name: How the Little Match Girl Met the Queen of Vampires
description: The little match girl plays a magical flute.

name: The Little Match Girl and Her Friend, the Crow
description: The little match girl goes on a spooky adventure with her friend (a crow).

name: The Little Match Girl 4: Crown of Pearls
description: In The Little Match Girl 4 by Hans Christian Andersen, a prince has been born, and the titular little match girl must assemble the subtitular Crown of Pearls.

name: The Little Match Girl against the Universal Sisterhood of Naughty Little Girls
description: A short game taking place soon after The Little Match Girl 4: Crown of Pearls.

name: The Crimson Debt
description: You've lived your whole life in a single basement. Now, your cage is unlocked. You could leave this house at any moment you want. But without knowing what happened, can you ever truly be free?

name: Gent Stickman vs Evil Meat Hand
description:
Interactive Fiction Parser Game WITHOUT TEXT, just hand drawing graphics.

Short, minimalist, difficult puzzles, full of help.

name: Exanimum: The Silent Call
description: "Exanimum: The Silent Call" is a first-person psychological horror game. In this chilling experience, you will find yourself confronting terrifying mysteries and chilling secrets.

name: Kao the Kangaroo: VIP
description:
Get the VIP look!
Future proof your fashion sense with this all new DLC pack for Kao The Kangaroo!
The VIP DLC pack contains three sci-fi themed costumes including - Space Knight, Robotic, and Future Punk. All three sets can be mixed and matched with previous cosmetics, adding a galaxy of options to your fashion choices!

name: Kao The Kangaroo: Top Of The Class
description: You might not make smart moves, but at least you can dress like you do! Containing two full outfits (made up for four items) Kao can now dress with that big brain energy or mix it up to add a dash of class to an outfit, all without costing a thing!

name: EverMerge: Match 3 Puzzle Game
description:
EverMerge’s sandbox-style game play offers endless possibilities and combinations! Find new mergeable items - and meet classic characters and creatures - as you merge to complete puzzle quests and reveal new lands.

Lift the cursed fog over the lands of EverMerge by matching and combining clusters of identical pieces to merge them into better ones. Each merge will reveal new discoveries and puzzles as your game expands around you.

name: Evo Island
description: Evo Island is a strategy mobile game where you play as a creature that must fight to evolve.

name: Platformer Geometry Dash
description: Geometry Dash 2.2 released a brand new way to play Geometry Dash, platformer mode. Platformer Mode now allows players to move at their own pace navigating tough corridors and fighting different bosses.

name: Madness Hydraulic
description:
Upgrade Hank, build turrets and blast the baddies through progressively intense, CPU-crushing waves.

Made for Madness Day 2010 and based on the Madness characters by Krinkels.

name: Cazzarion: Astro Bouncer
description: Sin descripción

name: Arcade Archives: Tank Battalion
description: "Tank Battalion" is a shooter released by NAMCO (Bandai Namco Entertainment Inc.) in 1980. Players take control of a tank and fight to protect their HQ from enemies in this predecessor to "BATTLE CITY" and "TANK FORCE." You get more points for taking down enemies at close range, head-on, making risky attacks the key to attaining high scores.

name: Worm War: Greengrocer
description: Sin descripción

name: Trading Simulator
description: Trading Simulator is an exciting and educational game that immerses you in the world of financial markets, where you become a virtual trader.

name: Pipe Connect
description: Pipe Connect immerses you in the exciting world of plumbing puzzles and eye-opening challenges to develop your problem-solving abilities.

name: Seishoujo Kantai Virgin Fleet
description: Sin descripción

name: Simple Number-Based Color Sense IQ Test
description: Master Your Color Sense and Challenge the Time Limit! Quick and Artistic Brain Training Quiz for Play

name: So Much Stuff 2: Collector's Edition

name: Special Forces Strike: Tactical Swat Shooter
description: Take on the role of a secret agent specializing in anti-terrorism operations in an exciting first person shooter!

name: Hot Rider Racing Simulator
description: Fuel your need for speed. Take the lead and leave the rest in the dust.

name: Lost Lands: Stories of the First Brotherhood
description: A strong brotherhood is forged only in difficult trials.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Amazing Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: My Bakery Empire: Tasty Edition
description: Sin descripción

description: Wanna see something amazing? Like, really electrifying? The ultimate neon puzzle game is here!
