name: Neon On!: Chain Lights
description: Sin descripción

name: Portal Shot Gun Teleport
description: Ready to warp, flip, and twist your way to victory? Dive into the portal puzzle adventure!

name: Rain World: Deluxe Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Animal Buddies: Party Beasts
description: Fur-tastic fun! Thrill with animal pals in vibrant adventures!

name: Balloony
description: Roll, jump and fly through Balloony's adventures! For 1-4 Players

name: Bucket Crusher: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Cozy Hamlets
description: Build, design, and relax in your very own medieval haven.

name: Dentist Bling
description:
Ready for the ultimate dental experience?
Dive into the world of tooth care and become a master dentist!

name: Dentist Bling: Mad Scientist
description: Sin descripción

name: Dentist Bling: Tooth Fairy
description: Sin descripción

name: Dog Racing: Lovely Pet Friends Paw
description: Race, Customize, Conquer – with your loyal furry friend by your side!

name: Eggconsole Ys II PC-8801mkIISR
description: A grand story unfolds in the ancient kingdom of Ys. The raging development that unravels the many settings inherited from the previous title is a must-see!

name: Freaky Trip: Complete Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Guardians of Time: The Chronicles of Chronos
description: Join this exciting saga, where friendship and courage merge. Live every moment of this great epic adventure. Don't miss the opportunity to be part of this legendary story!

name: Hentai Anime Girls Succubus
description: Puzzle Your Way to Passion - Discover Anime Temptations!

name: Beauties Unveiled 2: Joy Level Pack
description: Being a groupie may have certain perks and you will get to meet your idols. Sometimes you may even get an autograph. In case of Joy, you may be able to get more than you bargained for…

name: Beauties Unveiled 2: ShingCEO_69 Level Pack
description: When you play games all the time, it's important to take regular breaks and regenerate. Doing so, a controller check is something that might let the time fly between game sessions. Make sure to check the vibration settings!

name: Beauties Unveiled 2: Tiffany Level Pack
description: Nothing ruins a good match like malfunctioning equipment. You get off the court, sit down, lose your concentration while applying a new overgrip and suddenly it’s over. Tiffany experienced it first-hand but she may have found another way to reignite the passion.

name: WorldNeverland: lower Trimmed Wear Set - Mint
description: Sin descripción

name: Sprout Valley: Lovely
description: Sin descripción

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories - Personal Boards 4
description: Sin descripción

name: The Crystals of Atlantis
description: A latest match-three game, where you'll strategically swap and match dazzling crystals across 38 levels in Story Mode or compete for high scores in Classic Mode.

name: Escape Game The Abandoned Hospital
description:
Something is wrong with the hospital they brought me to.
I have a bad feeling about this...
I have to get out of here as soon as possible...

name: Wallpaper Wizard: Infinite Backdrops
description: Explore a wide collection of colorful wallpapers and personalize your digital space to your liking. Easily change the mood with vibrant images to suit your mood or the occasion.

name: Warring Universe
description: Warring Universe is a vibrant, endless, and thrilling game about intergalactic conflicts!

name: Warrior Escape
description: Help our Space Warrior escape this ship by touching your screen to fly higher. Stay away from the door, and don’t drop down.

name: Help Police: Pull the Pins
description: Help Police: Pull the Pins is a game featuring a familiar, popular, simple, and accessible puzzle game with a variety of difficulty levels.

name: Paint Rings
description: Paint Rings is an addictive endless one-touch game where you tap the screen to shoot a ball. Try to avoid the coloured parts and paint all the rings to complete the level before the time runs out.

name: English Tracing Book
description: English Tracing Book - help a child learn to draw letters and the alphabet.

name: Air Traffic Sim: Airport Dispatcher Simulator
description: Welcome to airport controller simulator! You are airport administrator and you need build a route for the flight of the airplane and land the airplane on the airfield!

name: Airport Link: Connect Near Me
description: Enjoy a wonderful airline simulator. Relax at rush hour and prove your management skills as a flight controller.

name: Block Magic Puzzle
description: Block Magic Puzzle is a classic game with a 10x10 play style.

name: Cube Jump Ultimate
description: This is a simple cross the street game using an isometric format.

name: Blossom
description: Early spring, 1999, Taoyuan Village. In just several days, a series of drowning incidents occurred in the same quaint village. Then, on the night of the fifteenth day, numerous villagers witnessed a woman in red who bore an uncanny resemblance to a lady who had previously met an unjust demise...

name: Kaidann
description: You are trapped in a strange staircase, and you must determine what is happening here and head for the exit, which is on the first floor.

name: Cross the Maze World
description: Independently develop games, 3d games, and travel through the maze world to explore, kill monsters, and solve puzzles

name: Floain
description: What is happiness? Happiness is the sea, the wind, the rainstorm -- and the eternal love "Perhaps I can also live a peaceful and happy life like an ordinary person." Stay tuned, the exciting story of the evening rain and flowing flowers

name: Wits Battle Simulator
description: This is a 3D multiplayer online cooperative confrontation strategy game. You can cooperate or compete for the final victory. The game has many classic and innovative gameplays built in. Players can also use the editor to create their own wits games and upload them with Play with friends.

name: Nightmare House
description: You are trapped in a nightmare. Observe the house and try to escape from this nightmare house.

name: Dice Birth Road
description: Dice Birth Road is an independent single player Rogue turn based deck building game. Faced with powerful enemies, you need to fully utilize dice card management to manage your hand and defeat them. Defeat all enemies and explore the story behind the game.

name: Submersed 2: The Hive
description: Submersed 2: The Hive is a first-person science-fiction horror game, set in the harrowing depths of the Atlantic Ocean.Face the horror of being submerged at the bottom of the ocean.

name: Stories to Tell: Run Away
description: In "Stories to Tell - Run Away" you are a young Spanish man named Mike who is staying at his grandparents' house since his parents have gone on a trip. One night his grandparents went out to dinner and Mike was all alone, or so he thought...

name: Stickman WW2
description: Join the historic battles of World War II in the new game Stickman WW2

name: Drop Pane: Not Only Match-3
description: Drop Pane is a Tetris-inspired indie game that blends the gameplay of match-3. The swift drop of piece challenges your breadth of attention and quick reflexes, demanding a sharp mind for effective handling. The game contributes to the development of spatial and language intelligence as well.

name: I Ask The Cube Where To Go
description: This should be simpler than other similar games. I ask it many things just because of my mental state, please don't mind.

name: Dire Island
description: Caught in a sudden storm, your team's once-promising voyage ended in disaster, leaving you stranded on Dire Island. United by the need for survival, you now face the island's mysteries and challenges together.

name: Liekki
description: Liekki is a fast-paced puzzle platformer where you play as a little fire spirit and try to burn as much as possible – or as little as possible. Solve levels using different fire related powers and change levels while burning them down.

name: All Cats 'r Belong To Us
description: In All the cats are belong you will start off your quest with a small band of adventurers aiming to get back your precious cats. By slaying monsters and gathering experience, you will be able to upgrade your adventurers, gain more allies and, maybe, even gain a small foothold in the game world.

name: Road Toad
description: Embark on a whimsical journey with Road Toad, a charming arcade adventure featuring a goofy toad navigating minimalist landscapes, collecting power-ups, and facing quirky challenges.

name: Ghost Ascension
description: Challenge hordes of ghosts, create builds, and unlock permanent upgrades! Ghost Ascension is a 2D rogue-like with a strong progression system. At the end of each wave of enemies, choose the card that best fits your build.

name: Parallel Plague: Good Old Days
description: "Parallel Plague: Good Old Days" redefines gaming excellence as a standout entry at the 2024 Steam FPS Festival. Experience the hybrid FPS and TPS gameplay in a post-apocalyptic world filled with zombies, offering a unique blend of action and strategy for an extraordinary adventure.

name: Powerup Humans
description: Can you craft the perfect mindscape defense and help your person reach the breakthrough that will powerup their future? Enter the minds of ordinary people and prepare for a fast paced strategic battle that could change their lives forever!

name: Iskelonia
description: Crafting, plants, insects, mushrooms, ruins, in a semi-textual game

name: MemoryBombs
description: Simple memory game. Play against time and challenge your memory, avoiding the bombs finding one will mess up your game. Get some cool icons and letters!

name: Jousting in January
description: Murderize your enemy(ies). No retreat. No surrender.

name: Beater: Apocal Undone
description: Apocals have taken over the earth. Fight through hordes of Darklings in this roguelite/survival setup to cleanse the world of these apocalyptic creatures. Beater not only allows you to choose powers for your character but for the enemies as well.

name: Find The Backdoor
description: Find the Backdoor is a single-player horror game. Go through different sinister levels in order to find the next backdoor. Survive those you meet and discover all the secrets. Will you manage to complete the game?

name: Echoes Of Despair
description: "Echoes Of Despair" plunges players into the horror of an abandoned hospital, where Sarah, an investigative journalist, must survive supernatural forces while uncovering the dark secrets of the past.

name: Apocalypse Love Shelter
description: Zombie apocalypse world! You built a shelter in advance, and countless girls wanted to enter your shelter for self-protection. Female neighbor, flight attendant, female boss, celebrity... All beings are equal before the end of time.

name: Helios Horizon
description:
In Helios Horizon you play as a robot mercenary, built and employed by Helios Horizon Inc.

Annihilate endless hordes of aliens in this action-packed sci-fi roguelite to fulfill your mission. For every mission completed, and every monster slain, Helios Horizon rewards its employees. Choose between upgrades to firearms or equipment to be an even more devastating mercenary.

Even if you are destroyed, the company will reassemble you. Helios Horizon cares about its property. Your upgrades will be preserved. With every death you will become stronger.

name: Call Hating 2000
description: A "mildly infuriating" first person adventure game with humorous narration where you use 90s tech to overcome an evil AI and make it to work on time.

name: Secret School
description: Uncover the secrets of the school, solve puzzles, and decipher secrets. Boldly explore corridors and rooms, but be on guard - challenges and riddles await at every step. Time waits for no one, the adventure begins!

name: Princess Polly
description: Ahoy, matey! Join the ranks of a stealthy ninja, skulking through the shadows of a haunted pirate ship to reclaim the esteemed Princess Polly and her royal kin from the clutches of Captain Pegleg and his peculiar crew—part undead, part lively dancing pirates and squawking parrots!

name: Cozy Caravan
description: Embark on a single-player, top-down journey in Cozy Caravan, where the arts of crafting, trading, and exploration come together in a beautifully cozy world. Form lasting bonds as you and your caravan journey through charming towns, enriching lives along the way.

name: Become Castellane in Another World
description: This gameplay is a virsual novel game developed according to the anime with same name of "Become Castellane in Another World", which enclude enriched plot branch options to provide more funs during the jouney in another world by following the key role, to enjoy the journey with funs and happiness.

name: Ancient Cultivatrix
description: "Ancient Cultivatrix" is a Roguelite cultivation game with tower defense elements. The world was corrupted by chaos and became utterly depraved. Please gather the surviving cultivatrices and unite them. Enhance Taoist energy and spiritual prowess together, gradually uncovering the elusive truth.

name: Rise Eterna War
description: Rise Eterna War tells the bloody tale of Arthbane, a great general who led the last stand to reclaim his homeland Ars Rare from foreign invaders. Play as Arthbane, 10 years before the events of Rise Eterna, rallying loyalists in a desperate bid to seize the capital Gaiacus.

name: Core Awakening
description: A top-down retro rogue-like. Explore a world that is slowly being corrupted by an unknown entity. Play solo or up to 4-players. Pick a class and discover, collect and modify dozens of different guns, abilities and upgrades. Find the source of Corruption and stop it from spreading.

name: Space Drop
description:
Leap from spaceships into warp tunnels moving at extreme speeds in this exhilarating VR experience. Evade obstacles, maneuver through space gates, collect pickups, and challenge yourself to become the best “Space Jumper” in the universe.

Compete for Galactic Glory

name: Sovereign Elect
description: To become the new king, a contestant must secure the favor of at least four of the seven influential guilds in the kingdom. The contest is open to individuals of any background, fostering a diverse array of contestants vying for the throne.

name: In Misery: Episode 1 - The Farm
description: Lost on an unfamiliar back road in one of the most remote parts of Missouri, you stop in a small town called Misery for help, but what you find is much worse. In the single-player, exploratory, horror anthology series "In Misery", your main goal is simple: make it out alive.

name: Angry Robot Girlfriend
description: Angry Robot Girlfriend is a fast paced third person shooter in which your survival, memorization, and shooting skills are put to the test while you aim to accomplish your goal of many different paths leading to one solution.

name: Tavern Manager Simulator
description: Restore your fantasy tavern to its full glory. Repair, improve and expand the establishment. Cook delicious food and keep an eye on the mood of the visitors. Create a unique atmosphere for unforgettable adventures!

name: Novark
description: You crash land on Novark during a rescue mission. With hostile aliens in a war, nowhere is safe and everything is out to kill you. Fight to survive. Discover secrets. Fight epic bosses. Progress through the story. Survive and escape Novark!

name: I, Chatbot: Aisylum
description: Probably one of first games in which you talk to real AIs! There are seven chatbots in the AISYLUM, the sanatorium for crazy AIs. And one of them is YOU! An small, experimental, educational indie "talking simulator", powered by generative AI on your PC.

name: Empire FactionWar
description: Immerse yourself in an epic world where you control a faction and fight for dominance of several cities. Strategy, economic management and military tactics are essential to achieve victory. From growing your cities' economies to upgrading your troops with weapons and equipment.

name: Ninja Chowdown: Glaze of Glory
description: Play as Donatsu, the chubby ninja and use your secret arts to fight along 35 action packed levels, in which to collect donuts and defeat members of the evil food clans. Ninja Chowdown: Glaze of Glory is a delicious pixel art arcade that will put your abilities to test.

name: Reign
description: A competitive six-player card game in an FFA format for cynics of thinking strategically, intellectual challenge seekers, and those who want to play something special.

name: Idle Animal Anatomy
description: A colorful clicker simulator where you can yourself grow a living creature cell by cell! Watch how organs, bones and skin are growing! Feel like a real scientist by becoming a pet creator!

name: Delicious Donut
description: Donut puzzles. Very. Delicious.

name: Atoners: The Lost Epoch
description: Saving the world can also lead to wealth! Braves, eliminate all demons, and their dungeons will definitely sell for a good price. Then, replace them with more expensive shining armor and move towards the next dungeon!

name: N+1: New Life For Unemployed Youth!
description: This is an independent game of magical realism that attempts to break the barriers between virtuality and reality and find the meaning of human life in a meaningless, repetitive, boring and obscure life.

name: King of The Hill
description: "King Of The Hill" is a top-down survival game where you have to defend your castle from enemies. Hire knights and heroes, improve them and your economy, fight different enemies and set records for time.

name: Martyrdom
description: Martyrdom is a psychological horror game about torture.

name: Magibrick
description: "Magibrick" is a uniquely styled deck-building game. Assemble a deck with the right Magibrick and challenge diverse enemies in different regions. Fill the board, destroy enemy bricks,play amazing combo, and occupy the entire board with your Magibricks, leaving no space for your enemy.

name: Exterminator
description: Exterminator is a Fast-Paced, High Octane Action Third Person Shooter, Inspired By Armored Core & Vanquish, Destroy Hard Bosses, Get Their Armaments ,Modify Armaments, Destroy Hordes of Robots ,Solve Puzzles, Learn New Skills , Try Different Builds & Customize Your Robot.

name: Midnight Racer
description: Arcade sythwave car game. Hey there, champ, can't sleep? Had a tough day? Or maybe you just helped yourself relax? Sit back, relax to the synthwave beats. Turn off your brain, just watch, play, and relax.

name: Echoes of the Abyss
description: Dive into a rogue-lite survivor action game, where world changes based on your Sanity. Eat or be eaten. Grow from Prey into Hunter. Build ability-combos to survive waves of creatures from the Abyss. Uncover secrets of your lost humanity.

name: Faded
description: Welcome to FADED – a visually stunning walking simulator with puzzle elements that takes you on an emotional journey through solitude and the daily struggle against

name: Jobsworth Weekly
description: Congratulations! As an upstanding member of the community, and since Simon had a stroke last Friday, you have been made the interim editor-in-chief of our fine village newsletter, Jobsworth Weekly.

name: Peppermint Falls
description: Peppermint Falls is a farming simulator set in an enchanting world of sweets. Cultivate delightful candy plants, explore the world with your whimsical pancake house companion, forge friendships with charming confectionary inhabitants, and discover fabled mysteries!

name: Manika
description: "Manika" is a psychological horror game played in the first-person perspective. Solve puzzles to escape from a mental hospital where you don't know why you are there and try to regain your memories. Good luck, because you are not alone...

name: Roots of Fury
description: In this action packed RPG you play a scientist that shrunk herself to defeat insects that are eating the roots of her plants. The scientist enlists the help of an ant hive, where she has her base and can also craft weapons.

name: Lucid
description: Lucid is a fast-paced, retro-style first-person shooter that thrusts you into a surreal world. Battle against eerie mannequin rulers in a high-adrenaline, violence-packed journey. Explore shifting dimensions in a pixelated dreamscape that blurs the line between reality and imagination.

name: Sweets Inc
description: Create a confectionery empire in Sweets Inc, the business management simulation game where you take the helm of your very own sweets manufacturing company. Design delectable treats, build and manage your factories, and market your products across the continent to become an industry tycoon!

name: Hell's Scream
description: Go back in time with an old school shooter game. Imagine yourself in a violent world where mass slaughter cannot be prevented. All you can do is survive, and that's not going to be easy.

name: Surviving Ceres
description: Surviving Ceres is an open world survival game with an emphasis on crafting and base building. Export rare materials and manufactured goods to earn funding used to unlock new technologies and upgrades. Bring in colonists from earth to work advanced facilities to terraform the planet.

name: Mythic Trials
description: Mythic Trials is a competitive Hack'n'Slash in which every player will create their unique skill build. It includes hundreds of Solo trials, Battle Royale PvP, Diablo-like item loots, daily World Bosses, rankings, draft tournaments, and dozens of different skills and is playable on mobile.

name: Atlantis Heroes: Rise of the Lost Land
description: Dive into Atlantis Heroes, an online multiplayer with stunning graphics and innovative gameplay. Choose diverse characters, unleash groundbreaking skills, and compete in thrilling esports. Every moment is a chance to redefine your gaming adventure!

name: Tenno
description: Dive into the captivating world of "Tenno", where the art of the ninja takes center stage. Craft your very own ninja, molding their appearance and abilities to match your vision.

name: Road To Valhalla: Carola
description: A 2D retro game based on the lore of the Spanish Streamer Carola. In this adventure you will travel through a fantasy world exploring platform levels, completing missions and defeating enemies alongside powerful bosses.

name: Poor Artifact Maker
description: The Poor Artifact Maker is a tower defense game based on Chinese fairy legends. The refiner has to explore the dangerous world in order to find his lost companion. The only way to overcome the endless ferocious beasts in the wilderness is to keep collecting materials to refine spiritual weapons

name: Duck Dash
description: "Duck Dash" is a top-down arena shooter roguelite game. Players take on the role of a little duck and embark on a journey of growth, strategically selecting optimal skill combinations to become a mighty warrior.

name: Chromacell
description: In this sideways scrolling shmup, take control of your spaceship and navigate through vibrant pixelated environments filled with hordes of enemy spacecraft. Upgrade your ship and weapons, dodge enemy fire while blasting through each stage. Emerge victorious as the ultimate space pilot!

name: Ion.A
description: Non-linear graphic novel in the genre of magical realism. Will the hero be able to uncover secrets, find himself and escape from danger? Or will he be lost in the streets of the City forever?

name: Foulbreaker
description: Welcome to the exciting fantasy world where the mix of adrenaline, strategy and magic reaches its peak! "Foulbreaker" is a bagel in the classic sense, where you will have an endless battle with frenzied monsters in a troubled kingdom.

name: Backrooms: Lost Place
description: Single-player horror game based on the backrooms universe. Your task is to pass levels, puzzles and try not to die during all this.

name: Line of Fire: Pirate Waltz
description: Line of Fire - Pirate Waltz is a local multiplayer duel of pirates. Commandeer a ship of your choosing, master maneuvering around the dangers of the Seven Seas, manage your resources and time your shots perfectly to sink your enemy and emerge as a victorious captain against your friends.

name: Neoproxima
description: Investigating a time-loop during the Cold War, light years away from Earth. Neoproxima is a text-based adventure game that combines exploration and simple RPG and survival mechanics. Plan your next loop carefully, and go as far as possible before time catches up with you.

name: Shadow City Mysteries: A Clockwork Noir
description: Shadow City Mysteries is a narrative adventure game in which players take on the role of a detective investigating a Mystery. Or is it a Conspiracy? Or is it a Supernatural Thriller? Experience the story multiple times to discover a story and world bigger than they suspected existed.

name: SwordSpin: Arena of Blades
description: SwordSpin is a indie game in the casual genre that combines different aspects of game design, such as strategy, creativity but still retains its casualty. Players will play as a character that wields a warrior who is using a spinning sword, and his task is to fight mobs to survive in the arena.

name: SUS
description: SUS : Survivors Under Space is 80s arcade inspired rougelite space shooter. Defend yourself from endless enemies. Select your weapons carefully and grab items to manipulate time and space, blow up the asteroids, and shoot down the enemies. Leave no survivors.

name: Suika Pets
description: Suika Pets is the adorable puzzle game where you combine your pets to grow your score without overflowing their container!

name: Escape Darkness
description: Escape Darkness: Survive the castle full of blood and mystery. Investigate rooms, follow clues and solve terrible secrets to find your way out of the castle. Feel the tension, gather your courage and fight to escape the dark world.

name: Squirrels Gone Nuts
description: Squirrels Gone Nuts is a fast-paced, multiplayer, arena shooter. Play as a speedy squirrel able to run on any surface and wield various guns. Procedurally generated arenas paired with an innovative game mode that blends capture the flag with king of the hill ensures a fresh experience every match.

name: Slap The King
description: Go fast and slap kings.

name: Aquium
description: Aquium is a casual single-player aquarium diorama designer where you can create your own underwater aquarium & relax with your fish. Embark on your customized ship to navigate the ocean, collect both real and fantastical fish, and add them to your uniquely designed aquarium!

name: Neon Rush
description: Speed through a neon city in this 2D retro racing game. Outsmart cops and rivals with skillful maneuvers. Immerse yourself in illegal racing, fueled by synthwave beats, and dominate as the underworld's top racer!

name: Laser Lightshow
description: A board manipulation laser-bouncing puzzle game, featuring a level editor, pack editor, and hundreds of handcrafted levels!

name: Leaf Blowing Simulator
description: Experience the calming tranquility of blowing thousands of leaves around in Leaf Blowing Simulator, the only real-time physics-based simulator that allows you to effortlessly create your own virtual oasis. Shape nature at your own pace and find relaxation in the gentle flow of leaves.

name: Kelp Keeper
description: Take on a vital role in the ecosystem in this action-packed bullet hell. Control a charming sea otter and protect the kelp forest from an endless onslaught of devious sea critters. Skillfully dodge attacks, grab your prey, and eat them all at the surface for a huge satisfying snack.

name: Failed Trust
description: In "Failed Trust", you explore a mysterious technical center where you are sent to retrieve important documents. Immerse yourself in the world of technology, collect energy and solve puzzles to uncover the secrets of this mysterious place.

name: Livingmare Cold Calls
description: Your only fear is the fear of the unknown.

name: Blood of the Elves
description: This is a story of a high Elven prince fall from grace. He is thrown out of Solaris for his unclean blood. Finding himself exiled to the land of the lower he has to form unlikely alliances and train his vampire powers to obtain vengeance for his crown, his family and most importantly his honor.

name: Bubumbu
description: Bubumbu is a short and wholesome hidden objects game with a unique twist in which you get to help lost objects find their way back to where they belong, while exploring fully hand-drawn worlds full of quirky characters.

name: Galactic Ruler Enlightenment
description: Play campaign stories within the Galactic Ruler universe. Invade the galaxy to eliminate those who stand in your way or rally alien races to defend against the invaders. Fight battles at both planet and space across a procedurally generated galaxy. Use new unit control systems to manage your forces.

name: Small Living World
description: An ecosystem simulation running in your hands. Transform a desertic world into a lush forest. No stress, play at your own pace. This world is at your disposal. Terraform the landscape, add plants and animals. Create your perfect ecosystem.

name: Ash & Adam's Gobsmacked
description: You are a goblin in this mini-FPS roguelite. Fight your way through The Arenas where you wreck junkbots to thrill the goblin crowds.

name: Hero Society
description: Hero Society is an idle RPG game where you are a manager. Gather resources, upgrade buildings, level-up your heroes and defeat the bosses. All without the time consuming burden of RPG games.

name: Claria's Great Maze
description: Behind the Claria's Great Maze is the last village of humanity, and the maze is also the last barrier for humans to block enemies. And you are the last guardian of magic, the last hope of humanity.

name: Bladeborne
description: Delve into Bladeborne's medieval fantasy world, a CO-OP RPG adventure with battles, quests, and more! Join on this epic journey alone or with friends!

name: Duel with the Devil
description: Win the duel with the devil and save the city

name: Bridgelands
description: Bridgelands is a sandbox style story game. Navigate the communities and islands around the uniquely generated world as you help build them back up by solving their problems. Face unique environments, creatures, boss fights, and shape your islands in this voxel-based world.

name: Mugged
description: "Mugged" is a thrilling multiplayer PVP game set in a cartoon bank heist scenario. Players are split into Muggers and Police, each with distinct objectives. Muggers aim to stealthily steal the bank's gold, while Police strive to stop them.

name: Silver World
description: Silver World is a game where you become a player transported to another world, defeating silver-colored enemies that attack within the VR experience

name: Oathborne
description: Oathborne is a top down action roguelite hack and slash. Unlock new skills for your class as you delve deeper into treacherous dungeons with traps, bosses, puzzles, and hordes of enemies. Each dive into darkness contains a monolith which must be destroyed to open pathways in the overworld.

name: That Way!
description: Help your partner perform the heist of a lifetime! Send him instructions for how to get to each vault and make a getaway with your newly found fortune!

name: Foster The Monster
description: Explore different planets daily to find and capture Fosmons, including action-adventure elements. Collect random cards each day and choose your cards to find the best deck-building strategy for Fosmon research. maximize Fosmon development and strengthen the player to protect Earth from Fosmons.

name: Terrors of War
description: Step into the heart of WW2 mayhem! Lead a variety of unique units into epic battles, master supply logistics, and unleash devastating strikes on your foes. Be part of this ambitious early-access project and help shape the game's growth and evolution!

name: Corrupted Spirits
description: A young hunter named Cara is chosen by the Goddess of Light to bring the spirits of the land back to normal, getting rid of any corruption they might have in their souls. Along the way she will meet a few friends and allies that might try to help her on her journey.

name: Hidden
description: Two orphans twin sisters, Yuna and Luna, were caught and placed separately in an unknown facility. The elder sister, Yuna tries to find Luna in the facility and rescue her. They aim to escape from the facility which is surrounded by a strange and mysterious atmosphere.

name: Chibi Wars Kinetic Novel
description: Chibi Wars is a series of comic 'kinetic' visual novel stories... Featuring a cute Chibi artstyle following a group of Female Warriors as they face off against various denizens of hell including zombies, vampires and demons.

name: Christmas Carol
description: Christmas Carol is crammed full of gorgeous Hidden Object scenes and superb mini-puzzles, wrapped into a great storyline based on the famous Charles Dickens novel.

name: Space Empires I
description: Space Empires I is the first chapter of the Space Empires series. A classic galactic conquest and turn-based strategy video game where you are the leader of a race of intelligent beings building large spaceships for interplanetary and interstellar travel through warp points between star systems.

name: Intown Nightmares
description: A horror almanac that tells the story of events in the city of Intown, built around a science station. The town is caught up by nightmares that in the future will affect the lives of every resident, follow how the impact of the nightmares on Intown will change over time.

name: Holiday Motel Simulator
description: Step into the role of an owner of a neglected motel waiting for a second chance. Begin your journey from scratch, planning and executing a comprehensive renovation of the property. Make your best and transform the motel into an oasis of comfort, ready to welcome the most discerning travelers.

name: Awful Marco Bros
description: Awful Marco Bros is a short game where you play as the enemies and try to beat the protagonist.

name: Gunzo!
description: Gunzo is a Single player fps game that features, A draw bridge, enemy's you can kill, very good shooting effects, milk that heals you, really good graphics, and most importantly very fun gameplay!

name: Death World
description: After a long night you wake up alone in the bunker as a bunker security guard. Hunt, kill, gather. Do anything to survive.

name: Mayonnaise Simulator
description: Third person shooter with minor platforming. You have to eliminate the condiment threat.

name: Eggness
description: Eggnes is on a mission to rescue his wife from the evil Crack Pot, who wishes to cook her. Eggness is a difficult old-school 2D action game. It features hand drawn animations and boss battles. Now in early access, Episode 1 features 1 boss battle, 1 platform section and 1 story mission.

name: Technofumer
description: FPS Action Arcade Game.

name: Hopwander
description: Embark on a journey above the clouds in this small cozy game. Guide a charming frog through puzzles, face scary monsters and engage in conversations with quirky characters. Your froggy adventure begins now!

name: Quirkbound
description: Quirkbound is an absurd, colorful and lighthearted turn-based fantasy JRPG. Join Isaac, Clara, and Naoto as they fight bizarre enemies, collect stickers, and cook falafel for the sake of saving the world.

name: Endless Faith
description: Highly addictive and interesting, Endless Faith allows you to control the game with simple hand movements. The gameplay is easy and enjoyable. If you're looking to play during your free moments, join us, download Endless Faith.

name: Candyland: Sweet Survival
description: Uncover the ominous mysteries of an abandoned chocolate factory. Navigate eerie levels, solve sinister puzzles, and outwit malevolent entities. Collect precious candies, unveil the factory's secrets, and confront the darkness. Are you brave enough to explore Candyland's dark secrets?

name: Embers of the Evening
description: The oil is running out. The expedition is doomed. You will never reach the lighthouse. But something worse than death awaits you if you give up. Operate the engine. Explore the ship. Unveil the truth that lies beyond your reality.

name: Gug
description: Gug is a roguelike creature-battler which mods its own functionality. Build your team, counter your foes' strengths, and evolve game-breaking powers defined by any word you choose!

name: Nazizombie's Slayer
description: Immerse yourself in a top-down pixel shooter. Play as an adamantite mercenary and follow the course of events taking place in an alternate universe.

name: Roshamboss
description: A 3v1 party game where 3 heroes team up to battle 1 raid boss in a superpowered game of Rock, Paper, Scissors.

name: Return
description: Return is an anime-style platformer-hack-and-slash game where an agent works for an organization that makes contracts with the government to take down any threat.

name: Froggo's Adventure: Verdant Venture
description: A Simple and Bite-sized retro 2D Platformer about a frog on another side-scrolling adventure

name: Legend of Sword
description: This is a 3D Idle ARPG . You can ride a cool mount to travel around the three worlds, and at the same time, you can use hundreds of gods for your own use. Grab the BOSS, seize equipment, and encounter strange opportunities, just to become the best immortal!

name: Pirates. Naval battle
description: This is a hardcore game, and it's not the easiest control. But if you can acquire combat skills, then exciting battles with pirate ships are waiting for you.

name: Mix It!
description: Embark on an educational space odyssey in Mix It!, a captivating Astropilot training adventure. Master the physics of light through dynamic gameplay, stunning visuals, and award-winning sound design. Explore, learn, and conquer the universe in this genre-defying educational experience.

name: Forgotten Secrets: Escape Room
description: A year ago, Professor Oliver Wood left to explore an ancient temple. Worried about not hearing from him, you decide to go yourself to find out his whereabouts. In this escape room, you will have to discover what happened to the professor while you investigate the secrets of this mysterious place.

name: Duck, Duck, Shoot
description: In this action roguelike shooter you lead an flock of ducks in a vibrant 3D isometric world. Your feathered friends will follow your every move, unleashing their unique attacks on your foes. Navigate through challenging landscapes and face formidable bosses as you upgrade your ducks along the way.

name: Asyle
description: Lose yourself in Asyle's open world environment to catalogue and tame wondrous creatures called Zoa. Explore the world and with the help of a team of Zoa you've befriended along the way, document the wildlife and uncover the nature of the mysterious catastrophic storms.

name: Dark Ride Simulator
description: Blue Squid Theme Parks presents the VR simulator of their most popular ride The Dark Zone. No need for long trips, now you can experience this iconic ride from the comfort of your own home.

name: CrumbleMiner
description: CrumbleMiner is a Frenetic Rogue-like Pixelart Platformer without jumping! Align your explosive barrel and BLAST trough rocks collecting precious gems and ride on top of a ROCKET barrel while avoiding your death through the dangerous Crumble Mines!

name: Project Bubblegum
description: Journey through the galaxy as a squad of space rangers in this dynamic, co-op action-arcade game for up to 4 players! Explore multiple planets and experience plenty of drama as you take part in this online or local couch co-op epic space adventure.

name: Fight Back The Night
description: A fantasy action-adventure game in which you must use a variety of fire-based powers to defeat an army of monsters infesting your realm. Upgrade your abilities, unlock new ones, and fight more and more enemies in this bullet-hell like game.

name: Flash Diving
description: Short horror game where you survey the descent of a capsule through a hole in the middle of an ocean, with only 4 lights and your ears to ensure your surroundings remain clear.

name: Re:Ark
description: RE:Ark is a fast-paced and deadly action-shooter in crisp monochrome palette. Cleave your path through insane inhabitants of the station. Transform your abilities and learn dark origins of the tragedy that happened on The Ark.

name: Netcode Warriors
description: ⁤Dive into the datascape of 'Netcode Warriors', an anime-style arena fighter designed from the ground up to take competitive play to its limits. Engage in intense 1-v-1 fights, master unique characters and playstyles, then take your skills to the arena. ⁤

name: Dobbel Dungeon
description: Gather your party, roll your dice and embark on a quest to discover why the local wildlife has suddenly turned evil! No two adventures are the same in this dice-powered tactical RPG!

name: Brand New World
description: You are given a chance to influence the development of your characters and settlement, forcing you to think strategically and make decisions that will affect the events in the game. Enjoy this immersive game experience where your every move will have meaning and consequences.

name: Dreams of the Void
description: May Campbell moved to the island of Cassiopeia years ago to live with her grandfather. Now, she she tries to survive day by day in a rotting world. Solve puzzles, uncover truths, and help May see tomorrow's daylight in this strange narrative-driven exploration/puzzle game.

name: Blister Blight
description: A robot assassin fuses with a noble mechanic. Take the role of Blister Blight as you confront your fellow rulers of Ridgescar. Repair or destroy? Wreck or Reform? The Blights await their fate!

name: Click To Ten 3D
description: the number rises, in 3D

name: Sliced
description: "Sliced" is an exhilarating PvP game where players engage in deadly combat, wielding axes and spears to strategically dismember opponents in a fierce arena. Master the lethal art of combat in this relentless, blood-soaked death fest.

name: Electrobasis
description: Electrobasis is a 3d dialogue-driven game, sprinkled with platforming and puzzle quests. Meet a cast of heavenly hosts that come with a MYRIAD of issues, and help to fix (most of) them! The casino yearns for a savior - she awaits a restoration.

name: Exitus
description: You woke up, and you have no idea where you are. What a coincidence, you don't remember anything at all; could you have been kidnapped? There is only one way to find out.

name: Swordhaven: Iron Conspiracy
description: Swordhaven is a classic party-based RPG. Explore the land of Nova Drakonia, embark on quests unique to your character, discover mysterious artefacts of the ancients, and unravel a hidden conspiracy that threatens the very existence of the world.

name: Cosmic Paradox: Noire
description: Cosmic Paradox: Noire is a 2D top-down shoot ‘em up adventure set in a world of two overlapping dimensions. Witness the battle between the Vex Accord and the Oronix Empire, increase your odds of survival with the right upgrades and choose a ship that is best suited to your playstyle.

name: Souls
description: The souls are imprisoned in the mansion. Free them. Then you too can live.

name: Q-Linq
description: Q-Linq is a VR game where skill and story merge into a skill-based adventure. It's a fresh take on the bubble-pop / match-3 genres. Solve challenging physics-driven puzzles with quick thinking, precision aim, and strategic prowess.

name: Roboglitch
description: He needs to escape.

name: Finally Free
description: A point & click top-down horror adventure game that takes place in a nightmare

name: Horror Nightmare Collection
description: The Horror Nightmare Collection is an anthology of retro-style horror games. Immerse yourself in unique stories, from eerie forest horrors to forsaken prison nightmares, pushing your nerves to the limit. Explore psychological and grotesque terrors in this dread-inducing assortment.

name: Labyrinthian Lockdown
description: Klondor is in grave danger of being overwhelmed, enter the Labyrinth, prepare your defences, defend your Mana Crystal and annihilate the incoming waves of enemy forces that pose a threat to the Kingdom.

name: Dungeon of Stone
description: You just woke up and you don't know who or where you are. How did you get to this place? How are you going to get out? Make your way through hallways full of enemies and traps, discover who you are and find a way to escape.

name: Slash Abyss
description: Slash fate, Break free! 'Slash Abyss' is a light roguelike RPG. You play as a powerful but amnesiac character. Join your 'deceased' comrades, equip yourself with diverse items, and unravel the story's secrets, all with the goal of achieving 'resurrection'."

name: Enterprise: Space Agency Simulator
description: Take the helm of a cutting-edge space agency with the mission to explore and exploit the Solar system. Realize the historical, and futuristic mission to establish humanity as the Interplanetary species.

name: Road of Death
description: This is a fun and casual puzzle game where you can continuously shoot, eliminate more monsters, and challenge your strongest score!

name: Legend of Love
description: This is a road racing game that allows you to engage in passionate racing on the road.

name: Decypher
description: Decypher hidden codes, with tons of exciting variants and levels

name: CEO Sim: GameDev
description: CEO Sim: GameDev is an economic simulation game for managing an IT game development company. Take on the role of the head of a young company and develop your project. Implement your business strategy and lead your company to prosperity!

name: Sporti's Universe
description: Sporti's Universe is an innovative exergame designed to address the challenge of getting school-aged children to engage in physical activity in today's digital age. It leverages technology to encourage physical movement while providing an engaging and enjoyable gaming experience.

name: IceFitter
description: It's a puzzle game where you slide ice blocks to fill all the holes. The rules are very simple, but surprisingly difficult. There is no element of luck or action, so it is recommended for people who simply enjoy solving puzzles.

name: Hoverkitty In The Hoververse: Chapter Three
description: In this 3D game, you can play as either Hoverkitty or Hoverflea, which means you have multiple ways of completing a level. This has aspects of an adventure, first-person shooter. You will meet enemies, such as the Hoverkitty Hunters, and also new allies.

name: Ninjurate
description: Enter the thrilling world of Ninjurate, where ancient ninjas rise to the defense of a mysterious jungle island surrounded by a mighty sea. The island has become the scene of a battle with zombie pirates, revived from forgotten times.

name: Tavuti
description: Tavuti's adventure to regain the power of the Whale God and rescue the kidnapped COCOSI!

name: Elemental
description: Fire and Water what is that an online game made up of players ?

name: Sword of the Necromancer: Resurrection
description: Help Tama to save Koko using the powers of the forbidden Sword of the Necromancer. Turn your foes into allies and reach the depths of the Necromancer's dungeon. Gain enough power to bring Koko back from the dead, no matter the cost. Now in 3D and with a renewed battle system!

name: Luminous
description: Luminous is a small, light-based puzzle game. Use your wits to find a path through every puzzle and race to get the best time!

name: Essence Bloom
description: Essence Bloom is a linear, story-focused indie visual novel that allows the player to experience a world with beautiful cherry blossoms and fun times with friends....

name: Black Ocean
description: "Let's play with me, horses of the gods, I'm ready, come to my sea."This is a deck building card game where the journey to prevent the 'black sea' that warps the world.Be a reasoner and work with your colleagues through a twisted, dreamy puppet show.

name: Musashi: Mobile Samurai
description: Square Enix's first 3D action title for mobile platforms is an original fast-paced adventure set in the world of the PlayStation 2 game, Musashi: Samurai Legend.

name: Doronko Wanko
description: 『DORONKO WANKO』 is a DORONKO Action Game. In this game, You can become a cute, innocent Pomeranian, make your master's home messy and dirty. "Will the master be angry with me?" Don't worry. Because you are a sweet doggie.

name: Nottolot
description: NOTTOLOT is a robot hacking action game. Your character can take over enemy robots and use their special abilities to escape from the factory.

name: Boomeroad
description: BOOMEROAD is an exhilarating action-adventure game in which players slide along boomerang rails you will create. The game is set in an ancient ruin floating in the sky, and the player slides through the vast skies at their own will while searching for the Artifacts.

name: Bill & Ted's Excellent Game Boy Adventure
description: This is a homebrew port of Bill & Ter's Excellent Game Boy Adventure for the Commodore 64, complete with modern improvements.

name: PETSCII Bros
description: This Commodore PET game has similar game mechanics to the original Mario Bros arcade game. Hit the floor under the turtles to flip them, and jump up to kick them. A one or two player action game made for the TOJam 2023 game jam.

name: Exit: Left or Right
description: You can go left or right, but remember, a mistake will cost you your life…

name: Missile Defence
description:
There are two dead safe methods to survive a nuclear attack with ICBMs. Defence with anti missiles and "Duck and Cover" where a simple desk will defy a multi megaton nuke. Your mission is to protect six major cities against a global nuclear attack, else perish with them.

You control three anti ICBM missile launch sites, if you run out of missiles or all your launch sites are destroyed you are out of luck until the end of the stage.

name: PETSCII Raiders
description: Based on the classic space invaders game. Destroy all raiders while avoiding guided projectiles from the mother ship at the top of the screen

name: PET Panic!
description: The arcade game Space Panic was the first "platformer" game, and it inspired more popular games of the time such as Lode Runner and Donkey Kong. There were many different versions of Space Panic on the original 8-bit machines, including Apple Panic which won a number of game awards. This is an updated version for the Commodore PET.

name: Help the Cats
description: Here are some cute hand-drawn cats that need your help. You can help by finding hidden things around you. Guess the cats' clues to lift the tablecloth, search through the mouse hole, and open the door. If you open the tomb incorrectly, you may be in for a surprise!

name: Balls like a Frog
description:
You, as a loveable little amphibian, have stumbled upon the temple of Blaf.

This disturbance has made you aware of the Sun god being trapped inside one of the temples, where he is kept encased in stone.

While at this temple you see that it tries to destroy you with spheres on a path, so you must get firing and bust those balls before they reach the skull and end the frog's hopping life.

name: Veggies vs. Undead
description: The zombies are on the loose, actually they are already in front of your property. The only thing between your brain and their insatiable appetite is your front lawn. Luckily you just acquired an assortment of powerfull flower seeds. Plant them fast and smart to protect your home.

name: Soko64
description:
Sokoban is a famous puzzle game designed in 1981 by Hiroyuki Imabayashi, and first published in December 1982.

You have to place all crates over the targets, by pushing them.

This C64 version includes 64 8x8 tricky levels by David Skinner.

All levels are unlocked from the beginning, for you to try them all.

Solved levels will be marked with green.

name: The Konia Project
description:
The Konia project is a game for C64 where you can play 3 games "inside" a Nok... ehm, an old "Konia" cellphone, while funny text messages entertain you.

Hitting spacebar in-game makes you warp in the "crazy mode", where a game switches to another game suddenly.

Hitting spacebar during the menu choice picks a random chat to show.

Can you reach 255 points and break the "indestructible" phone?

name: Hearts N Bones
description:
This is a port of the game Hearts N Bones to the Commodore 64. It was originally made for the HP 200LX Palmtop PC.

It is a Minesweeper like game where the objective is to collect all of the Hearts on the board.

name: ViperTen64
description:
The goal of this game to control a snake to move and collect food (the numbers from 1 to 9) in the screen map. If you collect all the 9 numbers, you win and the game is over. If you try to move the snake with a movement contrary to its movement (eg move it to the right while it is going to the left), you lose and the game is over.

In the same place where a number is eaten, an obstacle is left. If the snake touch one of the obstacles or the edges of the screen, the game is over. To start the game again just write RUN and press RETURN.

name: Sloany vs. Reggie
description: Take the role of Sloany or his mate Reggie as they plod through a load of bad guys that loosely resemble whatever he was into at the time – ninjas, batman, arcade machines, Subbuteo players, Pac-Man etc.

name: Valiant Tactics EX
description: Real Time Strategy and Card Games Fuse into One!

name: Adult Moolah Nitwit Terrapins
description: Embarrassing name aside, this is another vertically-scrolling, run-and-gun shooter, this time staring Terrapins, that may or may not bear a striking resemblance to other be-shelled pizza loving reptiles.

name: Sloanysoft C64 SEUCK Games
description: These games were made in the 80s on a Commodore 64, using Palace Software's Shoot'Em Up Construction Kit. Sloany made these back when he was about 11 or 12. The tapes were found some years later & preserved for posterity as TAP files.

name: Pop Up Story: Mahou no Hon to Seiju no Gakuen
description: A mobile RPG about raising students to become adventurers in a school set in a fantasy world.

name: Day of Eevee
description: Day of Eevee is a Commodore 64 game about Eevee's birthday. Play three separate mini-games to earn medals. Each mini-game has a secret alternate solution!

name: Phosphenia
description: A short 3D Platformer about a little boy that's scared to grow up.

name: Night Crows
description: In 13th-century Europe, where magic still exists, we created a new world in which fantasy meets reality. Night versus day, light versus darkness, order versus chaos, and oppression versus rebellion— everything clashes and collides in the lands of medieval Europe. Dive into the most realistic experience of the European continent, brought to life with Unreal Engine 5.

name: Royal Affairs: AI Romance
description: Royal Affairs is a date sim game where the use of AI not only makes the characters and stories come alive, but also makes every palace romance and strategic conspiracy come to life. Players will experience the highly interactive and personalized choices brought by AI technology, and every decision will affect your power and love path. From in-depth conversational interactions to the details of giving birth and raising children, AI makes everything extremely real, providing a royal life experience full of challenges and fun. Get ready to explore the medieval kingdom empowered by AI and start your palace romance adventure.

name: MetaGraph
description: Puzzle adventure MetaGraph, a captivating desktop environment game where you'll uncover secrets and solve puzzles.Immerse yourself in a cyberpunk world, using your intellect and tools to solve problems that defy norms. Dive into a mind-bending experience that mirrors your desktop!

name: Circus Elephant
description: Circus Elephant is a 3d platformer, where you play as an elephant in a circus. You need to control a ball that the elephant rides

name: Sir Fallen
description: A game about a Knight, a Dog, Climbing and Rage Quitting.

name: Valince Genesis: VR
description: Immerse yourself in 'Valince Genesis: VR' as Detective Sinclair. A routine investigation leads you to the opulent Crimson View Hotel. Uncover the truth behind a mysterious disappearance in a storyline full of twists. Explore, decide, and survive using guns and tools. Can you escape?

name: Fruit Mountain
description: Fruit Mountain is a 3D physics puzzle game where you stack fruits. Combine fruits of the same kind to make them bigger and bigger! Stack them up without overflowing the plate and create your own Fruit Mountain!

name: Sputnika Game
description: A Cosmic twist on a Suika-style game with space gravity. Help our little friend Sputnik on his journey to become the Sun.

name: Geometry raid
description: 《Geometry Raid》is a rogue-lite space slash shooter game, the game combines classic barrage shooting and sword slash game elements. By driving a two-part ship,you can shoot and swing tail to crush the enemy . The game focuses on hardcore physics simulation and maximizing the melee slash experience.

name: Kinsfolk
description: Kinsfolk is an emotional single player adventure game. You will embark on a journey to discover the meaning of family. Explore the beautiful world with atmospheric music. Discover and relive stories about the past.

name: Kaiwa
description: A psychic horror sound novel developed in an omnibus format.

name: GizmoLab VR
description: A VR sci-fi sandbox game where you can put your skills to the test to build crazy inventions, with mechanics analogous to real-life electrical engineering.

name: Shining
description: This is a detail oriented action shooting game that uses directional keys to move characters and clicks the mouse to design.

name: Annoy This Guy
description: Annoy this guys time in this comedic piece of interactive fiction.

name: Space Hat
description: Space Hat is an adrenaline-fueled, fast-paced FPS game that combines intense combat with well thought out platforming sequences. In this futuristic sci-fi world, the player assumes the role of a cyber bounty hunter equipped with a special hat that grants the power of teleportation.

name: ActionHacker
description: "ActionHacker" is a casual sneak-action game in which you control the main character, an electric man, and aim for the deepest level. Take control of the main character "Elec", an electric man, and sneak through numerous gimmicks. Be the first to reach the deepest part!

name: Kotoko's a Little Weird
description: After years of stress from trying to act perfect, Kotoko decides to throw out her old way of thinking, and be herself.

name: Always 1-1
description: Search for "anomalies" in a 2D platformer

name: Planetstar Warrior
description: Planetstar Warrior is a horizontal scroll-space shooter with numerous powerups and a gradually increasing level of difficulty. Defeat all enemies on each level to progress.

name: Twizzle Puzzle: Monkeys
description: Twizzle Puzzle: Monkeys - is the perfect puzzle game for a fun and rewarding pastime.

name: Saw Lab
description: Saw Lab: Test Your Survival InstinctIn a world where every second could be your last, your fate lies in the hands of a mad genius. "Saw Lab" is not just a survival game it's a test of your mind, willpower, and ability to act under the pressure of unbearable fear.

name: Evader
description: Move white square with the arrow keys on your keyboard to dodge red squares.

name: Minimal Escape
description: Is the dark world you travel simply a little nightmare, or our future to come?

name: Unknown Signal: Invasion
description: Unknown Signal: Invasion is a continuation of the exciting sci-fi game. This time you have to go to the space station to investigate a new mysterious signal coming from an unknown source.

name: KindergarTen 3: The Basement
description:
The third part of the game is a little different to the other two. This part can be described as the mixture of the first two games. KindergarTen 1 was a little bit hard, full with jump scares and fast dolls/ plushies. KindergarTen 2 was much easier than the first game, but there were a few more horror elements and ambiance added; the second game gave a big focus at the backstory of the game/ of the murder.
So the third game actually contains both elements. It gives very big attention to the story, but it has even more chases and jump scares as the first one has. Now the player has to pay attention to one more thing: the oxygen pump. In every 2 minutes the player has to restart it to survive.

name: Scribble
description: Feel like a real designer and follow this strange but friendly character in this 2D, monochromatic adventure. In a fun game with fluid movement and simple, responsive controls. Venture between vertical and horizontal platforms, avoiding traps and cliffs.

name: Real Time Attack
description: Race to victory in this speedrunning extravaganza! Control the lovable Rucky Anguish as he tries to defeat Do Good Natas and avenge his father. With 16 levels of insane platforming action and built-in timer function, this is one real time adventure you'll LOVE attacking continuously!

name: Dental Strike
description: A throwback to retro shoot'em up games typical of the 80s, where you play as a tooth fairy fighting against rotten teeth and bacteria using different abilities and special shots.

name: Monster Shooter
description: Monster Shooter is a 3rd person point-based shooter in which you are humanity's last hope to protect your military base and the resources collected on the planet Hoperium against the Roncospheres. Take control and defend every part of the facility. Humanity depends on you!

name: Taurus War
description: Taurus War is a Sci-Fi turn-based strategy game.From 9 to 23 March, on sale 40% off O^~^O

name: Gift for You
description: "Gift for You" is a puzzle action game consisting of 25 stages. Players must conquer a variety of puzzles and aim for the top ranking by clearing time.

name: Inline: Out of Time
description: Complete your delivery routes as fast as possible to appease your corporate overlord while still finding time to enjoy the sights of the retro-futuristic city and your banging tunes.

name: Eldabyss
description: A fast-paced, bloody, gothic, and stylish platformer video game about saving the mortal realm from the wrath of Hell's armies.

name: Cuboyd
description: Control a cube and solve puzzles! Learn to master the power of equipping items on your six colorful faces.

name: Space Show Edition 17
description: The year is 2085, the year of the 17th Space Show. It's the most watched reality show in the solar system. 13 million contestants compete against each other in weaponized spaceships for the prize of immortality.

name: Sky Journey: Cozy Mornings
description: Find hidden objects from a peaceful post-apocalyptic world while relaxing in the company of a fun little boy and his robot friend!

name: Angler Quest
description: Giant fish and other aquatic animals are top of the food chain! Play as an Angler, a specialized hunter of these great beasts. Fish, craft and battle your way to victory as you move through ranks in the guild and get ever closer to finally beating the dreaded Vermundus, King of the Depths.

name: Multicrash!
description: Push your limits in Multicrash! by selecting when to dodge and when to crash while picking up coins along the way. Survive as long as possible in this simple, but challenging, retro-arcade game. See how you compare with others on the global leaderboard.

name: Bestiary Survivors
description: Embark on a journey in a world on the brink, where dragons threaten animal homeland. Master five elements, utilize dual attack modes, and unique clan abilities. Challenge dragon bosses, uncover hidden tales in this roguelite, hack-and-slash adventure. Can you withstand the dragon onslaught?

name: Scarlet Thread
description: Scalet Thread is a deck building game. Our core game is based on PVP ranked game .More postion strategy, More resource management ,Fight at winning blocks and get more resource at "Jungle".PVE Mode provided is a roguelike deck building game. you could pick up random cards during the PVE sessions .

name: Stray Shot
description: Monsters come from missed shots! Learn the monster's behaviours, shoot wisely and balance the difficulty to maximize scoring!

name: Hive In Space
description: A black hole threatens to engulf the solar system. Humanity is migrating aboard a spacecraft. You play as the chief engineer and must overcome anomalies & hallucinations to keep the ship stable.

name: Last Respects
description: Last Respects is a short, single player indie horror game where the player must solve an unexplained murder case and banish a demonic presence.

name: Spyro the Dragon
description: Spyro the Dragon is a sidescrolling game for mobile devices based on Spyro: Shadow Legacy.

name: GlaiveBound
description: Explore a magical world full of puzzles, treacherous dungeons, and fearsome foes, in a Zelda-inspired co-op adventure.

name: Anomaly Exit
description:
You were on your way home one day when you realised the train was stopping at the same station over, and over again... at least you thought they were all the same station...

Taking elements from Exit 8 and I'm On Observation Duty, Anomaly Exit fuses the spot-the-difference genre with psychological horror. Additionally, the experience is designed with singleplayer and multiplayer in mind.

name: WyrmBound
description: In WyrmBound, you can have thrilling fights to improve your skills, ride amazing dragons, control their abilities, and change the course of battles. Face off against legendary Asian deities and mythical creatures to bring back peace to the land.

name: Eden: A Genesis Through Time
description: A classic Sci-Fi adventure inspired by late 80s computer games. Explore an abandoned spacecraft and uncover the hidden horrors that lie throughout the ship.

name: Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare - Game of the Year Edition
description:
Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare differs from previous installments of the Call of Duty series. Previous Call of Duty games have a distinct three country-specific campaign style, while Call of Duty 4 has a more film-like plot with interlaced story lines from the perspectives of Sgt. Paul Jackson of the Marines 1st Force Recon and Sgt. 'Soap' MacTavish of the British 22nd SAS Regiment.

The Game of the Year Edition includes a code for the Variety Map Pack, adding 4 new multiplayer maps: Broadcast, Creek, Chinatown and Killhouse.

name: Communion
description: A mystery game where the clues are in every corner and death is not the end of the game, just another beginning.

name: Nightfall Conquest
description: "Nightfall Conquest" is a co-op, online survival game game where players fight darkness on a cursed island, uniting against evil, upgrading skills in real-time, and engaging in cooperative multiplayer. Face dynamic enemies and enjoy immersive combat to restore peace.

name: Jump Heroes
description: Experience the ultimate thrill of becoming a Jump Hero in this hyper-addictive arcade game! The goal is simple: survive as long as possible, beat your high score, and dominate the leaderboard. Play solo or compete with friends with local co-op mode!

name: BUS: Bro U Survived
description: Get ready for a crazy drive across Fang island! Gather your friends for this 1-4 player cooperative looting action game. Save people from the zombie apocalypse, craft and expand your base and turn your bus into a real beast! Escape the island and uncover its conspiracies in BUS: Bro U Survived.

name: Ethel
description: Immerse yourself in a unbelievable, story-rich mystery, packed with jaw-dropping plot twist, horror, and multiple endings. You'll need sharp observation skills. Solve tricky puzzles and navigate eerie environments without any hand-holding.

name: Left Behind
description: Left Behind is a hyper-realistic psychological horror game where you take on the role of a real estate agent with a client looking to sell you a property. Instead of a straightforward and quick interaction with the client, you find yourself thrust into a deeply unsettling and frightening situation.

name: Inescaped
description: Inescaped is a cooperative horror game designed for four players. What starts as a seemingly innocent game show quickly turns into a fight for survival as you find yourselves trapped within a labyrinthine structure pursued by monsters.

name: Rooster
description: A heartfelt, story-rich casual puzzle adventure celebrating the best of ancient Chinese culture. Explore an exquisitely hand-drawn world with delightful surprises, from cooking, finding hidden objects, paper crafting, and more. Guide Rooster in an emotionally rewarding tale about family and love.

name: Mouthole
description: Keep an eye on the time to ensure you make the most of your week in the psychospherical house of MOUTHOLE. Solve puzzles and unravel mysteries to forge convoluted paths of discovery and exploration. Navigate quotidian existence. Crawl into your mouth. Brush your teeth?

name: Sacrifice For Sale
description: A unique choice heavy visual novel that you won't find anywhere else! Escape your grim fate, by arguing your case... Learn about the cultists who hold you captive, dismantle the cult, manipulate them- all to not end up as their next sacrifice!

name: Galactic Pocket Dating
description: Sin descripción

name: Jim's Nightmare: Chapter 1
description: Go ahead and try a psychological point-and-click adventure and uncover the truth behind Jim's mental illness and his journey in “Jim's Nightmare". Experience the fear along being a sick bastard is why we are making this game.

name: Empolicy
description: Online strategy in a fantasy world with single-player options. Explore the world, expand the borders of your polis, build settlements and produce goods. Immerse yourself in the role of a powerful tycoon of the city-republic, choose your path - magic, diplomacy, espionage or war.

name: Irreversible
description: Immerse yourself in a world where darkness comes to life, and monsters inhabit every corner. Your journey is a fight for survival in a forgotten village shrouded in a paranormal nightmare.

name: Twitch Party
description: Mini-game platform fully playable in Twitch chat! You can find a quiz, a fair price, a pictionary etc. there! If you're a streamer, this is the platform you need to play with your community!

name: Perfect Ninja Painter 2
description: This ninja master is back in action and this time he's bringing a friend along.

name: Gas Station Simulator and Can Touch This DLC Bundle
description:
Gas Station Simulator
Gas Station Simulator is all about renovating, expanding and running a gas station along a highway in the middle of a desert. Freedom of choice and multiple approaches to run your business and deal with pressure are key ingredients in this game.

Buy an abandoned gas station in the middle of nowhere and restore it to its former glory. Get rid of debris and broken furniture, fix up the walls, paint and decorate the place to your liking. Just don’t spend all your cash on the looks right away, you bought a gas station after all. Repair the equipment, buy what can’t be repaired and start serving your customers to earn money for further renovations and improvements.

Gas Station Simulator - Can Touch This DLC
Get some new tools and redecorate your gas station. Change walls, doors, windows and move things around. Make your own art and rival Dennis’ artworks. Want to change the warehouse or the workshop? Now you can. And much, much more.

name: BouncingBalls
description: You will start with a weapon in a kind of training box with the sides slanted. Then balls fall from the sky that you have to hit, big balls that are easy to hit and small balls that are difficult to hit. Try to get as far as you can and don't let the balls hit you

name: Call of the Wild: The Angler - South Africa Reserve
description: Explore South Africa and catch unique new fish species with your friends. Complete missions at Fishing Hubs for rewards and discover breathtaking landmarks.

name: Orbs of Chaos
description: Choose 3 orbs, and have access to 10 spell combinations at any time in this retro survivor rogue-lite. Destroy hordes of Lovecraftian horrors, and battle unique bosses that rise from the Chaos every 3 minutes. Only limit is your speed and memory.

name: My Corp Cargo Simulator
description: In this game, we manage a cargo company in a small town. We can deliver cargo to customers within the city by walking, cycling, motorcycle or car. In this business start-up simulation game, you must make serious decisions and work hard to grow your cargo company.

name: Sword Smash 2
description: 【Overview】"Sword Smash 2" is an exhilarating top-down 2D action game with added features from its predecessor, Sword Smash. Various stages feature a diverse range of monsters, and defeating the boss in each stage leads to game completion.

name: Ghost Yantra
description: "Ghost Yantra" is a hand-drawn 2D Hack ’n' Slash Parkour game set in a branching Indian Cyberpunk city. Embark on a journey as Narak, a gun-for-hire, who after failing to stop a catastrophic event is on a quest for redemption and to fight for his freedom.

name: Emulated: OpsRunner
description: As an OpsRunner you get emulated into dangerous Scertanic City to complete missions and find out the truth about your identity.

name: Pineapple: A Bittersweet Revenge
description: Pineapple is a puzzle and story-revenge-driven game where you become the hero of the school by pulling pranks on the top bully. Time to give that witch a taste of their own medicine. With a pineapple.

name: Sultan Jumps
description: Sultan Jumps is a difficult challenge. A long and frustrating climb awaits you to save your grandchild. While controlling the Sultan, you must make difficult jumps and endure the harsh words of this grumpy grandmother.

name: Human Eater Idle
description: Earn experience points by completing levels and defeating enemies to level up your stickman and make them stronger and more powerful. With so many challenges to face and abilities to unlock, Human Merge Idle is a fun and unique game that you won't want to put down!

name: Super Sami Roll 2
description: A colorful 3D platformer with rolling-physics based movement. Sami and Vera are back and they brought new friends with their own unique abilities. Roll, grapple and bounce around like never before in this new epic adventure.
